LINES
dibujos

tuv.prop: maybe you can stay a little longer, for the summer?

estabas muy emocionada por todas las cosas que íbamos a hacer juntos.

tuv.prop: i know i didn’t turn out to be who you thought i would be, so please be honest, rhea.
...or are you just clinging onto the past?
tuv.seg: now that you know the truth, do you really like who i am...
ahora que sabes la verdad, ¿de verdad te agrada como soy…

tuv.prop: we’ve never had much of a discussion about it, let alone exploring other options.

tuv.prop: so what’s with all the questions anyway? was that a test?

bueno, seguro que esas historias son más interesantes que las de clientas engreídas…

tuv.prop: a total of 17 men were captured and charged with assault, all of whom were injured at the scene.
tuv.seg: Last night at approximately 10:15 pm, two victims, a woman and a child, were attacked by members belonging to a notorious gang that are known for violent crimes.
"anoche, alrededor de las {b>10:15<b} p. m., una mujer y una niña fueron atacadas por los miembros de una famosa pandilla, conocida por sus crímenes violentos".

tuv.prop: i think you could pull it off! i’d hire you-
damn, rhea... were you always into that kinda stuff...?
tuv.seg: NO, that came out very wrong! that’s not- NOOOoooooOOo!
¡aaaaay, no! ¡no quise decir eso! ¡nooooooo!

tuv.prop: i call dibs on the little one!
tuv.seg: ooh, look, a two in one deal. jackpot!
¡aah, mira! dos por uno. ¡bingo!

tuv.prop: then... mind if i ask you a question?
what would you do if you knew someone like that?
tuv.seg: sure, go for it.
claro, dime.

tuv.prop: the city is so different now. i know it hasn’t been too long, but i forgot how it was like being here and i was nervous for awhile.
y’know, they don’t exactly tell you this, but it’s hard meeting new friends out here.
tuv.seg: but i’m getting used to it, i think, and it’s nice to see a familiar face again...
pero creo que me estoy acostumbrando, y es agradable volver a ver una cara conocida…

tuv.prop: DAMMIT, don’t ever scare me like that again!
tuv.seg: SHIROoOoo-
SHIROoOoo-

tuv.prop: anyway, call me Bas, it’s short for Obasi! pretty cool, right?
tuv.seg: i ain’t ready to meet jesus, man!
¡no estoy listo para ir al cielo!

tuv.prop: no, i’m not seeing anyone... not anymore.
though, you’re pretty mysterious, you know that?
tuv.seg: hmm, okay. i’ll take your word for it.
mmm, bueno. te creo.

tuv.prop: maybe i’m not cut out for the “high life” after all...
tuv.seg: man, it’s so rowdy at night. has it always been this way?
caray, qué agitado es esto por la noche. ¿siempre fue así?

tuv.prop: hah, nice! i knew you couldn’t say no to me!
i’m a regular there, if i ask nicely they might throw in some free breadsticks!
tuv.seg: anyway, there’s this cool pizza place right around the corner, and the best part is they don’t serve veggies!
hay una pizzería excelente aquí cerca, ¡y lo mejor es que no sirven verduras!

tuv.prop: well, you’re unlikely to find any of them at this hour...
i don’t know what you remember, but recently there’s been a lot of... incidents, especially at night.
tuv.seg: ...especially here.
… y menos por aquí.

tuv.prop: i-i mean, it’s okay if you’ve got other plans! i just thought it’d be great to catch up again after all these years!
but we could always do this some other time, cuz it’s not like i’m going anywhere anytime soon, unless you’re leaving this time-
tuv.seg: rhea-
rhea…
sorry to worry.
no te preocupes.

tuv.prop: He's a little dramatic, needs pets and belly scratches to function, so if I'm ever slow to update, blame him.
Brb gotta go pet my dog-
tuv.seg: Your support means a lot to me, thank you for stopping by and I hope you'll like what you find!
Tu apoyo significa mucho para mí. ¡Gracias por visitarnos! Espero que disfrutes lo que encontrarás aquí.

tuv.prop: Hi, I'm Steph and I live with my dog.
Your support means a lot to me, thank you for stopping by and I hope you'll like what you find!
tuv.seg: He's a little dramatic, needs pets and belly scratches to function, so if I'm ever slow to update, blame him.
Es un poco dramático, necesita que lo acaricien y que le rasquen la barriga, así que si alguna vez tardo en actualizar, es culpa de él.
hnng...
ññññ…

tuv.prop: i do, but we don’t have to go into that now if you don’t want to.
tuv.seg: yeah, but after the night i put you through, you must have some questions.
seguro que tendrás preguntas después de la noche que te hice pasar.

tuv.prop: ah, damn._x0003_i missed the last bus...
tuv.seg: should i just call a cab then?

tuv.prop: Feelings rekindle as secrets begin to unfold, Rhea soon realizes her childhood friend may not be who she believes him to be, and thus her most cherished relationship is put to the test.
tuv.seg: Created by
Creado por

tuv.prop: nah, don’t worry about it, the movie wasn’t that great.
tuv.seg: besides, you’re still better than a certain someone who flaked on us.

tuv.prop: oh, sorry, i don’t think i introduced myself...?

quizá notes que está un poco… tenso. intenta ser amable.
wait a minute....
un momento…

tuv.prop: ...and i don’t want to do this anymore.
why don’t you come in and say hi?
tuv.seg: so you two go way back, then?
son viejos amigos, ¿no?

tuv.prop: so before you even start to make me look bad, think about why that is!
tuv.seg: okay. fine.
bien.

tuv.prop: i never thought i’d see you again.
tuv.seg: it’s been so long...
ha pasado mucho tiempo…

tuv.prop: i want you to keep it. and you can give it back to me...
tuv.seg: ...when we see each other again.
… cuando volvamos a vernos.

tuv.prop: hah, nice! i knew you couldn’t say no to me!
tuv.seg: okay. just for a little while.
bien, solo un rato.
god, i need to get out of here.
cielos, debo salir de aquí.

tuv.prop: it’s nice to do nothing sometimes.
tuv.seg: hmm, you’re right.
mm, tienes razón.

tuv.prop: i’m sorry for overstaying! i mean, s-staying over?
relax girl, it’s all chill! there’s plenty of room for ya.
tuv.seg: i didn’t mean to intrude like that.

tuv.prop: i wasn’t ready to lose you too.
tuv.seg: shiro...
shiro…

tuv.prop: you both have been too negligent with your responsibilities.

tuv.prop: normally the house would be a lot busier, but you’re early. the rest of us are asleep.

tuv.prop: geez, don’t worry, it’s just a scratch. besides, it wasn’t even a fair fight!

...the heck...?

tuv.prop: DAMMIT, don’t ever scare me like that again!
i-i got a call from rhea this morning, then i checked the news and saw the incident last night and you didn’t come home and i should’ve called to check but i was so tired so i went to bed instead-
tuv.seg: dude, what are you even talking about-
oye, ¿de qué diablos hablas?
i was giving you some genuine advice, how dare you accuse me of such selfish desires, i’m hurt!
es un consejo sincero. ¿cómo osas acusarme de esconder deseos {bi>egoístas<bi}? ¡hieres mis sentimientos!

tuv.prop: shiro! sweet baby jesus you’re ALIVE!
oh, phew. you two still look decent-
tuv.seg: wait, you can’t be in there-
espera, no puedes entrar…

tuv.prop: basically, it’s not safe to be out alone anymore.

tuv.seg: yeah... i figured.
sí, me di cuenta.

tuv.prop: no, you ate it all, remember?
eh, doesn’t matter, you can never have too many dips.
tuv.seg: wait, really? when was that?

tuv.prop: i just wish you’d asked me sooner.

ART & STORY BY
arte e historia:
...this time, it will be different.

tuv.prop: i...forgot. it wasn’t important, i guess...

rhea, i think you’ve got some competition.
rhea, creo que tienes competencia.

tuv.prop: y’know, it’s like what you said before, it’s dangerous in the city these days, especially at night.
don’t worry about it, it’s a pretty mundane job.
tuv.seg: since you work the night shift all the time, i can’t imagine it’s all that fun.
no creo que la pases bien trabajando en el horario nocturno todo el tiempo.

tuv.prop: i heard he got paid big for that job.
ain’t no one tossing you a coin for being a white knight here, you bastard.

DISCORD
discord
it’s...
es…

tuv.prop: same, same! we’ve got a lot to catch up on. what are you two up to tonight?

tuv.prop: suuure, but i can’t go too crazy, i don’t wanna rock up to an interview looking washed, y’know?
no, not yet, but i’m bound to hear back from at least one of them though, right?
tuv.seg: oh, did you hear back from anyone?
ah, ¿te respondieron?
okay, this is it.

tuv.prop: ugh, yeah. long distance is hard! don’t ever do that unless you’re prepared to deal with the heartache.
hm, what do you mean? weren’t you on the dating app awhile ago?
tuv.seg: honestly. i don’t think i’m built for romance these days.
sinceramente, ahora no me siento lista para el romance.
this... is it?
¿es… aquí?
it’ll be different.
... será diferente.
i noticed you got some scratches again, thought it’d be good to have that covered!
noté que tienes algunos rasguños. ¡pensé que esto podría ser útil!

tuv.prop: maybe your uh... girlfriend is calling?
tuv.seg: oh, NO, nothing like that.
oh, {b>no<b}, no es nada de eso.

tuv.prop: ah, well... my family is moving, it doesn’t make sense if i don’t go with them, does it?
it really won’t be the same without you here.
tuv.seg: no, i get that. i just wish you didn’t have to go so far away.
sí, lo entiendo, pero ojalá no fuera tan lejos.

tuv.prop: i guess you’re not the same boy i grew up with anymore.
tuv.seg: ...something has changed.
... que algo había cambiado.

tuv.prop: please understand, i have to go!
even if you don’t want to talk to me...
tuv.seg: shiro...
shiro…

tuv.prop: thanks, rhea! i owe ya big time. i’ll see you tomorrow!
ah, damn._x0003_i missed the last bus...
tuv.seg: hmm...
mmm…
i noticed... you get cuts around your hands a lot. what happened?
noté que… sueles tener cortes ahí. ¿qué te pasó?

tuv.prop: i’m waiting for someone, so do you mind?
you’re not from around here, are you?
tuv.seg: oh, n-no problem!
¡n-no hay problema!

tuv.prop: bruh, and you were not kidding when you said she is cute now!
tuv.seg: i did not say that-

tuv.prop: right. sorry, you could’ve woken me, i wouldn’t have minded.
tuv.seg: yeah, the movie ended awhile ago. i guess you were asleep for half of it.

tuv.prop: relax, i think i know what you mean... well, not really, but it’s fine?
um, anyway... i guess you could say various people hire us for various reasons?
tuv.seg: hnnnggg...
aaaauuch…
kori...
kori…

tuv.prop: hey, kori. i’m sorry for keeping you waiting.
i’m on the way to your apartment. i’ll be there any minute now.

vaya, me sorprendió que respondieras. ¿dónde estás?
no, i don’t think so. we don’t do that sort of stuff.
no lo creo. no solemos hacer esas cosas.

tuv.prop: i heard his family is a group of mobsters...
but he shows up with a new bruise every time...

tuv.prop: you are not fit to carry out your duties. you need more training.

tuv.seg: yo…

tuv.prop: it’s a lot to take in, but after that big scare this morning, i’m just relieved you’re still here.
tuv.seg: thank you for telling me all this.
gracias por decírmelo.
YOU.
eh, tú.

tuv.prop: oh, sorry dear, i didn’t hear you come in. no one said we were having guests over today!
oh! no sir, i’m here for... shiro?
tuv.seg: who are you here for? kira? kai?
¿vienes a ver a kira? ¿a kai?

tuv.prop: that is all. you are dismissed.

necesito un paseo.
geez, you do this all the time! don’t play dumb with me-
ey, ¡lo haces todo el tiempo! no te hagas el distraído…
but i think i know who you are.
pero creo que sé quién eres.

tuv.prop: hey, that’s the news about the incident from last night, right? did you hear?
well, you remember way back when there were rumors of this mob family going around?
tuv.seg: last night? no, i haven’t.

tuv.prop: hey, it’s okay, we’ll get you home as soon as we can, i promise.

¡sí! no lo había notado antes. apuesto que a las chicas les encanta.
hm?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: we’re hired to do things others wouldn’t do, all the dirty work... jobs that need to be handled in secret.
tuv.seg: sometimes, we do it to protect the people who need it most.
a veces, lo hacemos para proteger a personas que lo necesitan.

tuv.prop: ay man, didn’t hear you come in, when did you get back?
oh, so are you going somewhere again?
tuv.seg: yeah, just about an hour ago.
hace más o menos una hora.

tuv.prop: man, what i’d do to see them in action!
tuv.seg: though let’s be real, judging by all that i’m hearing, no one has got anything on these guys.
pero seamos realistas, todo lo que escucho me dice que nadie sabe nada sobre esos tipos.
it’s shiro.
es shiro.
let go!
¡suéltame!

tuv.prop: he wouldn’t have had the guts to tell me how he feels, or look me in the eye when he does it.
and hey, maybe you can also get to know me?
tuv.seg: you’re not who you used to be, but you’re better, and i think i’d like to get to know you all over again.
no eres quien eras, eres mejor, y creo que me gustaría volver a conocerte.
i guess you’re not the same boy i grew up with anymore.
supongo que ya no eres el niño con el que crecí.

tuv.prop: i noticed... you get cuts around your hands a lot. what happened?
ah, it’s just a knife accident in the kitchen.
tuv.seg: oh.
ah.

tuv.prop: someone around here has really high standards...
god forbid anyone have a bad hair day under her roof, you’ll never hear the end of it!
tuv.seg: well, i can respect the craft. that’s how my ma is like with hair!
ah, yo respeto a la gente con vocación. ¡así es mi ma con el pelo!

tuv.prop: i wanna return the shirt i borrowed. i swear it’s squeaky clean this time!
tuv.seg: huh. he’s still not back yet?
¿aún no volvió?

tuv.prop: i mean, my hair is pretty cool too, though. the best part is it stays in shape rain or shine, talk about structural integrity!

tuv.seg: yo…
ow, what the hell...?!
¡¿pero qué demonios…?!

tuv.prop: how on earth do you keep your hair in shape? like, seriously, what’s your secret?
look at it, it defies gravity!
tuv.seg: that’s your question?
¿esa es tu pregunta?
alright... play time is over...
bien, basta de juegos…

tuv.prop: not really, aside from an old friend i recently bumped into, literally.
tuv.seg: so you don’t know anyone here, then?
entonces no conoces a nadie, ¿no?

tuv.prop: his... family? what do they do, exactly?
hmph, and to think a year ago when we started dating, i thought i was finally getting to know him better.
tuv.seg: so you don’t know.
así que no lo sabes.

tuv.prop: asleep? you were hurt, and you ran off before anyone could help you!
i know you don’t want to talk about it, but could you at least try to consider how i was feeling too? how scared and worried I was?!
tuv.seg: i didn’t know where you went, or if you were okay, not even a simple text to let me know you’re fine.
no sabía adónde habías ido ni si estabas bien. no enviaste un solo mensaje para decirme que estabas vivo.
well... what do you think?
¿qué piensas tú sobre eso?

tuv.prop: go on ahead! i’ll take care of things from here.
tuv.seg: thanks, rhea! i owe ya big time. i’ll see you tomorrow!
¡gracias, rhea! te debo una. ¡hasta mañana!

tuv.prop: Your support means a lot to me, thank you for stopping by and I hope you'll like what you find!
tuv.seg: Brb gotta go pet my dog-
Ya vuelvo. Tengo que ir a malcriar a mi perro.

tuv.prop: A bystander claims that the two victims were rescued just in time by a mysterious man dressed in black, who disappeared as soon as help arrived.
many believe he is a member of an underground vigilante organisation that are responsible for numerous heroic acts across the city in the past decade.
tuv.seg: the rumored vigilante, who some believe is a work of fiction, has been making headlines in a series of similar incidents.
"el supuesto justiciero, que algunos consideran una figura de ficción, ha protagonizado titulares por una serie de incidentes similares".
so... right after that?
¿después de eso?
...looked like you had so much to say.
… transmitía que deseas expresar algo.

tuv.prop: when you see him, he may be a little... tense. just try to be gentle.
tuv.seg: oh, sorry, i don’t think i introduced myself...?
ah, perdón, creo que no le dije mi nombre…
i hear you.
comprendo.

tuv.prop: we could meet on purpose if you want.
okay, sure! the city is a lot different now, maybe you can start by showing me your favourite place around here?
tuv.seg: did i just ask her out?
¿la invité a salir?

tuv.prop: so maybe that means i have less to be afraid of, too?
tuv.seg: but now that you know what i do, if i get caught, they might come for you too, and you’re okay with that?
pero ahora que sabes lo que hago, si me atrapan, podrían intentar ir por ti, ¿eso no te afecta?

tuv.prop: oh, phew. you two still look decent-
tuv.seg: CUT IT OUT, OLD MAN!
¡para ya, {bi>viejo<bi}!
maybe we can start with that.
quizá podamos empezar desde aquí.

tuv.prop: i’m sorry for overstaying! i mean, s-staying over?
tuv.seg: ah...
ah…

tuv.prop: but you chose to make a fuss and now we’re in this mess...
tuv.seg: so if i’m going down, you two are coming with me!
si voy a perder, ¡ustedes también perderán!

tuv.prop: sorry, you’re not a good fit for our company.
maybe i’m not cut out for the “high life” after all...
tuv.seg: ah, that’s okay. thanks...
ah, lo entiendo. gracias…
um, i-i think i’m fine, but the girl-
creo que sí, pero la niña…
no, stay back!
¡no, aléjate!

tuv.prop: he’s not perfect, but he’s good. you can’t possibly think he’d hurt you like that, right?
god, i don’t know what else to tell you, but you sound like you’ve got issues that have nothing to do with me.
tuv.seg: oh please, save me the lecture. everyone can be a cheater, some just don’t get caught!
{b>oh, vamos<b}, ahórrame el discursito. todos engañan, ¡solo que algunos son más disimulados!
it’s shiro.
es shiro.

tuv.prop: dude, what are you even talking about-
tuv.seg: DAMMIT, don’t ever scare me like that again!
¡maldición! ¡no vuelvas a aterrorizarme así!

tuv.prop: wait, what do you mean “supposed to”?
you knew that i saw you last night, are you seriously trying to pretend it didn’t happen?
tuv.seg: shiro, i’ve been trying to reach you for hours!
shiro, ¡he tratado de ubicarte durante {i>horas<i}!

tuv.prop: most of them make sense, but sometimes doing the right thing requires you to bend the rules a little.
probably not, if you put it that way...
tuv.seg: that doesn’t make you a criminal, does it?
eso no te convierte en un criminal, ¿verdad?

tuv.prop: oh yeah, kids at school used to talk about that a lot.
tuv.seg: well, you remember way back when there were rumors of this mob family going around?
bueno, cuando vivías aquí circulaban unos rumores sobre una familia mafiosa, ¿recuerdas?

tuv.prop: hey, why’d you look so sad? aren’t you having fun?
tuv.seg: um...
emm…
that’s a promise!
¡es una promesa!
that voice...
la voz…

tuv.prop: it’s not safe for a girl to be out alone at night...
tuv.seg: i said back off!
¡ya déjame en paz!

tuv.prop: what do you think about the vigilantes they were talking about?
tuv.seg: y’know, the one from the news today?
ya sabes, los del noticiero.

tuv.prop: he already told me about you a long time ago.
that’s his room right there. go on, i’ll leave you to it.
tuv.seg: he... did?
¿l-lo hizo?

tuv.prop: gosh... i know people can change, but he was so different when we were younger...
you know, it’s really uncommon for a girl to be out this late at night.
tuv.seg: i wonder if he’s used to getting all this attention now, or does he not notice?
¿se habrá acostumbrado a recibir tanta atención o no se dará cuenta?

tuv.prop: do you really have to go?
no, i get that. i just wish you didn’t have to go so far away.
tuv.seg: ah, well... my family is moving, it doesn’t make sense if i don’t go with them, does it?
ah, bueno… toda mi familia se muda. debo ir con ellos, ¿no?

tuv.prop: uh... we used to go to school together when we were kids.
he hasn’t changed too much though, just looks a little different. i’m surprised we can even recognise each other.
tuv.seg: we lost touch when i moved away, so we’re not as close as we could be i guess?
perdimos el contacto cuando me mudé, así que no somos tan cercanos como podríamos.

tuv.prop: miss, we have to get you to safety first-
we’ll try to find him, but you have to come with us right now, okay? you’re hurt too.
tuv.seg: don’t leave him behind!
¡no lo abandonen!

tuv.prop: i have a few questions about a man i was seeing...
um, sure? and this man is... shiro?
tuv.seg: and you appear to be the only one who has all the answers.
y tú pareces ser la única que tiene todas las respuestas.

tuv.prop: officials urge citizens to avoid leaving the house at night and encourage travelling in groups to lower the chances of being targeted...
tuv.seg: oh-
ah…

tuv.prop: ...or are you just clinging onto the past?
tuv.seg: because that version of me you hold on to, the one you said goodbye to at the carnival...
porque esa versión mía con la que te quedaste, a la que dijiste "adiós" en la feria…

tuv.prop: if i was seeing someone, i would’ve told you before.
tuv.seg: AH.
{b>ah.<b}

tuv.prop: did it not_x0003_occur to you that i simply wasn’t checking my phone at this hour, maybe i was asleep?
i didn’t know where you went, or if you were okay, not even a simple text to let me know you’re fine.
tuv.seg: asleep? you were hurt, and you ran off before anyone could help you!
¿durmiendo? ¡estabas herido y huiste antes de que pudieran ayudarte!

tuv.prop: you’re not from around here, are you?
you’re not from around here, you don’t look like you’re from the city.
tuv.seg: huh?
¿cómo?

tuv.prop: it’s obvious that you both care about each other a lot.
tuv.seg: so what’s stopping you?

tuv.prop: okay, maybe fifth time’s the charm. i can do this!

tuv.prop: it’s my first real gift to a friend, so take good care of it, okay?

tuv.prop: involving innocent civilians in our family’s business is not ideal, regardless of what they may mean to you.

tuv.prop: it’s a lot to take in, but after that big scare this morning, i’m just relieved you’re still here.

tuv.prop: ...and i don’t want to do this anymore.
would you be upset if i said no?
tuv.seg: okay, do you want to talk about it?
¿quieres que lo hablemos?

tuv.prop: i just wish you’d asked me sooner.
tuv.seg: no.
no.

tuv.prop: i belong to a family of vigilantes.
sometimes, we do it to protect the people who need it most.
tuv.seg: we’re hired to do things others wouldn’t do, all the dirty work... jobs that need to be handled in secret.
nos contratan para hacer lo que otros no harían, el trabajo sucio… cosas que deben hacerse en secreto.

tuv.prop: sorry about that, i wasn’t looking...
tuv.seg: y-yeah, i’m fine, i was just a little spooked...
s-sí. solo me asusté un poco…
either ways, i’ll be back to visit some time, i’m sure of it!
como sea, seguro vendré a visitarte en algún momento.

tuv.prop: ah, well... my family is moving, it doesn’t make sense if i don’t go with them, does it?

no eres de por aquí, ¿verdad?

tuv.prop: hah, you... you’re the one who was at the shop that day.

tuv.prop: but hey, since you were the one dating him, shouldn’t you know him better than i do?
he’s reserved and doesn’t speak his mind much. he never talks about how he feels, and he has always been that way since we were younger.

tuv.prop: no. i don’t want to go back.

those eyes...

tuv.prop: i wonder if he’s used to getting all this attention now, or does he not notice?

tuv.seg: so for your sake, i’d stay as far away as possible.

tuv.prop: i don’t know what you remember, but recently there’s been a lot of... incidents, especially at night.

tuv.prop: what would you do if you knew someone like that?
what if... you knew someone, like the “anti-heroes” people are talking about, would you...avoid them?

tuv.prop: wait, you mean they are real?

shit...
mierda…
i have something for you.

tuv.prop: i know he can be a little hard to read, i... feel the same way too.

tuv.prop: hey, these girls are a pain, don’t you think so?

¿eh?
...rhea?

tuv.seg: i wasn’t ready for you to see me like this.

no no, i’m a special old man, i’m limited edition. it’s different.
ah, no. yo soy un viejo {i>especial<i}, de edición limitada. es distinto.
please, i want to go home-
por favor, quiero volver a casa…

tuv.prop: oh! no sir, i’m here for... shiro?
ehhh? does my boy finally have a girlfriend?
tuv.seg: shiro?
¿shiro?
huh?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: it’s never my intention to rope you into this, so...
tuv.seg: ...when you walk out that door, you don’t have to talk to me again, and i won’t hold it against you. i promise.
… cuando salgas por esa puerta, ya no tendrás que volver a hablarme. te prometo que no te lo reprocharé.

tuv.prop: i’m sorry, but i can’t wait around for nothing!
tuv.seg: hey, wait, you can’t leave!
oye, espera, ¡no puedes irte!

tuv.prop: i don’t think anyone would choose to be a vigilante for fun. it’s dangerous, and you’d be risking a lot.
they must have an important reason.
tuv.seg: if someone still chooses to do that...
si, incluso así, alguien lo hiciera…

tuv.prop: gonna introduce me to your special friend?
bas, this is Rhea, you remember her, i mentioned to you a few days ago-
tuv.seg: OH, bas!
¡ah, bas!

tuv.prop: look, i don’t know what went down between the both of you, nor do i need to know.
shiro and i are just friends, that’s it. we grew up together, lost touch and only started hanging out again recently.
tuv.seg: but everything you just said is not true.
pero nada de lo que dices es cierto.

tuv.prop: what do you think you’re doing?
tuv.seg: hisao.
hisao.

tuv.prop: hehe, that’s what they all say...
tuv.seg: oh no, it’s not like that!
¡n-no, no es eso!

tuv.prop: i wasn’t ready for you to see me like this.
i was scared you’d never talk to me again and i didn’t know what to say.
tuv.seg: what happened last night was real, and i knew i couldn’t hide things from you any longer.
lo que pasó anoche fue real, y sabía que no podía seguir ocultándotelo.

tuv.prop: should i just call a cab then?
tuv.seg: ah, damn._x0003_i missed the last bus...
ay, no. perdí el último autobús…

tuv.prop: hey, are you okay? where are your parents?
tuv.seg: wait... a little girl?
¿pero qué…? ¿una niñita?

tuv.prop: well, there were plenty of men who were injured last night, but none fit the description you gave us.
yes, i’m very sure. why would i make that up?
tuv.seg: are you sure you saw him leave?
¿estás segura de que lo viste irse?

tuv.prop: i’m waiting for someone, so do you mind?
tuv.seg: don’t worry, i won’t be long. i just need a drink. coffee will do.
no te preocupes, no voy a quedarme mucho tiempo. solo tomaré un café.

tuv.prop: there’s another man here, he’s hurt, you have to help him!
i-i don’t know, he ran off-
tuv.seg: okay, where is he?
bien, ¿dónde está?
i want you to keep it. and you can give it back to me...
quiero que tú lo guardes. me lo devolverás…

tuv.prop: oh, is that what you think?
tuv.seg: not exactly. i still don’t know if i should be rooting for them.
no estoy seguro. aún no sé si debería alentar algo así.

tuv.prop: okay. just for a little while.
anyway, there’s this cool pizza place right around the corner, and the best part is they don’t serve veggies!
tuv.seg: hah, nice! i knew you couldn’t say no to me!
¡genial! ¡sabía que no me dirías que no!

tuv.prop: don’t worry, i won’t be long. i just need a drink. coffee will do.
tuv.seg: hi, welcome to pic-
hola, bienvenida a…

tuv.prop: so do you like what you do?
everyone born into the family is expected to work here.
tuv.seg: oh... i don’t really think about that. it’s a job, i guess.
mm… no pienso mucho sobre el asunto. es solo un trabajo.

tuv.prop: trust me. he’s not worth it.
i didn’t want to doubt you, but it’s getting harder to pretend...
tuv.seg: shiro...
shiro…

tuv.prop: i belong to a family of vigilantes.
tuv.seg: en_US
es_LATAM

tuv.prop: so you guys moved in together, huh. what else have you been up to these days?
ooh, you have a job? what do you do?
tuv.seg: um, just regular work things.
lo normal, ya sabes, trabajo.

tuv.prop: hmm... it doesn’t look too good though...
tuv.seg: ah, crap. i shouldn’t be eavesdropping!
oh, vaya. ¡no debería escuchar a escondidas!
en_US
es_LATAM

tuv.prop: you are of age now, shiro. it’s time you claim the full responsibility of your role in this family.
you are not fit to carry out your duties. you need more training.
tuv.seg: but you must first be strong enough to control your emotions. until then...
pero antes, debes ser capaz de controlar tus emociones. hasta entonces…

tuv.prop: but if someone is in trouble and you could do something about it, are you supposed to just watch?
tuv.seg: man, i don’t know. on one hand, i can see why people want them gone...
vaya, no sé. por un lado, entiendo por qué la gente quiere que se vayan…

tuv.prop: when you see him, he may be a little... tense. just try to be gentle.
tuv.seg: by the WAY, RHEA...
a propósito, rhea…

tuv.prop: the old man is not always right, you know.
tuv.seg: you should learn to trust yourself a little more.
debes aprender a confiar más en ti mismo.

tuv.prop: that night... when i saw you again, a part of me knew things have changed.
tuv.seg: i guess you’re not the same boy i grew up with anymore.
supongo que ya no eres el niño con el que crecí.
...i know who you are.
sé quién eres.

tuv.prop: y’know, we never got to finish that conversation.
tuv.seg: it’s not safe for a girl to be out alone at night...
no es seguro que una chica ande sola de noche…
...this time...
... de que esta vez...

tuv.prop: um, i-i think i’m fine, but the girl-
tuv.seg: rh- hey, are you okay?
rh… oye, ¿estás bien?

tuv.prop: ah, it’s pretty late. do you have to go?
tuv.seg: maybe your uh... girlfriend is calling?
¿quizá tu, eh… novia te está llamando?

tuv.prop: come with us quietly, we’ll treat you real nice-
tuv.seg: help!
¡auxilio!

tuv.prop: try again tomorrow, seriously? who does he think he is?
and just when i thought things were gonna be different this time.
tuv.seg: god, it’s always the same with these guys.
cielos, con estos tipos siempre es igual.

tuv.prop: you’re always hiding, you never let anyone in, even when someone is trying so hard to understand you, you just... you won’t let them.
tuv.seg: listen, i’m sorry i came uninvited. now that i know you’re fine, i’ll leave.
oye, siento haber venido sin invitación. ahora que sé que estás bien, me iré.

tuv.prop: here! i know it’s not exactly your style, but i think it suits you, and it’s something to remember me by!
tuv.seg: pretty...
qué lindo…

tuv.prop: i’d suggest you pack up and leave, but no way in hell am i letting you go that easily this time.
tuv.seg: so say your prayers, cuz you’re going to hell.
así que empieza a rezar, porque irás al {i>infierno<i}.

tuv.prop: hey,do you still have the photos from the last field trip we took together?
oh god, i can’t believe i got away with that haircut!
tuv.seg: the one by the lake? i think so.
¿las del lago? creo que sí.

tuv.prop: okay, do you want to talk about it?
tuv.seg: ...and i don’t want to do this anymore.
… y ya no quiero hacer esto.

tuv.prop: god, i don’t know what else to tell you, but you sound like you’ve got issues that have nothing to do with me.
it’s not just who he is seeing, it’s...
tuv.seg: besides, you’re not together anymore, so why does it matter who he is seeing now?
y si ya no están juntos, ¿por qué te interesa con quién sale?

tuv.prop: i um, i was just trying to meet more people!
ah, it’s pretty late. do you have to go?
tuv.seg: but he didn’t show anyway, so it doesn’t matter-
pero no importa, porque él no apareció…

tuv.prop: and it’s really none of my business, but you left your first aid out on your dresser...
tuv.seg: so... you took off in a hurry last night after our dinner with Rhea.
te fuiste corriendo anoche después de que cenáramos con rhea.

tuv.prop: OH, yeah! sure, of course. cool, cool.
tuv.seg: a-anyway! what are the chances of us meeting like this again, right?
d-de igual modo, qué casualidad que nos volvamos a encontrar, ¿verdad?

tuv.prop: and who knows? maybe they can tell me all about it sometime, since i can be pretty nosy and i’m not afraid to admit it!
i mean, it’s sure as hell more interesting than stories about snooty customers...
tuv.seg: stuff like that interests you?
¿te interesan esas cosas?

tuv.prop: since you work the night shift all the time, i can’t imagine it’s all that fun.
most of the time i’m just taking care of a special delivery or dropping people off.
tuv.seg: don’t worry about it, it’s a pretty mundane job.
no te preocupes, es un trabajo bastante rutinario.

tuv.prop: OBASI? you guys are still in contact? no way, it’s been ages!
he’s doing great, still loud, hard to miss. we’re housemates now, actually.
tuv.seg: how is he doing?
¿cómo está?
i never thought i’d see you again.
no pensé que volvería a verte.

tuv.prop: please make yourselves at home. we’ll be right back.
tuv.seg: sorry that we have to borrow him for awhile.
lamento robárselo por un rato.

tuv.prop: hey man! i was just returning the shirt i borrowed the last time. didn’t know you were out, my bad.
so... you took off in a hurry last night after our dinner with Rhea.
tuv.seg: oh, okay. thanks.
ah, bien. gracias.
okay, i’ll try there then. thanks bas!
bien. intentaré ahí. ¡gracias, bas!

tuv.prop: most of them make sense, but sometimes doing the right thing requires you to bend the rules a little.
tuv.seg: the law is manmade anyway. they are just a set of rules decided by some old guys to keep things in order.
la ley está escrita por personas. solo son un montón de reglas creadas por unos viejos para que las cosas sigan igual.

tuv.prop: no one knows, but i sure think so.
tuv.seg: there’s just way too much proof of their existence, yet somehow, no face reveal! would you believe that?
hay demasiadas pruebas de que existen, ¡pero no sé por qué nunca les ven las caras! increíble, ¿no?

tuv.prop: i...no, you can stay. please stay.
tuv.seg: i didn’t mean to be short, i just...
no quería ser cortante, solo…

tuv.prop: i got worried, and our friend hasn’t seen him either. i just wanted to know if he’s okay, that’s all.
so what has shiro told you?
tuv.seg: hmm, i see.
mmm, ya veo.
what would you do if you knew someone like that?
¿qué harías si te encontraras con alguien así?

tuv.prop: y’know, we never got to finish that conversation.
tuv.seg: hey, leaving so soon?
¡eh! ¿ya te vas?
huh?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: we’re not heroes, rhea, and we’re not people you want to be involved with.
...when you walk out that door, you don’t have to talk to me again, and i won’t hold it against you. i promise.
tuv.seg: i can’t make you stay if you want to go, so...
no puedo obligarte a que te quedes, así que…

tuv.prop: so you provide a service... at night?
tuv.seg: shiro... a-are you... a stripper?
shiro… ¿e-eres… {bi>stripper<bi}?

tuv.prop: that will be $18.50, cash or card?
tuv.seg: huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: you wanna know what i think, do you?
tuv.seg: you are the other girl.
que tú eres la otra mujer.

tuv.prop: go on then, prove it. show us what you can do, or are you too scared?
tuv.seg: oi, show some respect! i’m talking to you!
¡ey! ¡muestra respeto, te estoy hablando!

tuv.prop: a man his age, with that build, why would he be tired all the time unless he is spending all his energy with another girl?!
look, i don’t know what went down between the both of you, nor do i need to know.
tuv.seg: wait, so you actually think he was cheating on you with ME?
espera, ¿entonces crees que te engañaba {i>conmigo<i}?

tuv.prop: He's a little dramatic, needs pets and belly scratches to function, so if I'm ever slow to update, blame him.
tuv.seg: Hi, I'm Steph and I live with my dog.
Hola, soy Steph y vivo con mi perro.

tuv.prop: ...is not what he makes it out to be.
tuv.seg: his... family? what do they do, exactly?
¿su… familia? ¿qué hacen exactamente?

tuv.prop: please make yourselves at home. we’ll be right back.
ugh, yeah, tell me about it.
tuv.seg: man, what a way to start a sunday, am i right? so much for sleeping in...
uf, qué manera de empezar un domingo, ¿no? podríamos estar durmiendo…
normally the house would be a lot busier, but you’re early. the rest of us are asleep.
normalmente la casa es bulliciosa, pero es temprano. el resto de la gente duerme.
ugh...
aag…

tuv.prop: so if i’m going down, you two are coming with me!
tuv.seg: NO, STOP!
¡no, para!

tuv.prop: so if i’m going down, you are coming with me!
tuv.seg: SLASH
ZAAS
i guess you’ll have to trust me, then.
entonces tendrás que confiar en mí.
no way, you’re joking, right?!
imposible, bromeas, ¡¿verdad?!

tuv.prop: okay, do you want to talk about it?
tuv.seg: it’ll be different.
... será diferente.

tuv.prop: yeah, i thought so too. so all the crimes you’ve been hearing about? apparently, they are being taken care of by these so called “fictional heroes.”
no one knows, but i sure think so.
tuv.seg: wait, you mean they are real?
aguarda, ¿dices que es cierto?

tuv.prop: ...when you walk out that door, you don’t have to talk to me again, and i won’t hold it against you. i promise.
thank you for telling me all this.
tuv.seg: shiro...
shiro…

tuv.prop: what if... you knew someone, like the “anti-heroes” people are talking about, would you...avoid them?
well, no...? actually, i don’t know.
tuv.seg: do you think you could trust them at all?
¿crees que podrías confiar en esa persona?

tuv.prop: so... did you get it done?
the errands, i mean. cuz y’know, since we’re both here, do you maybe want to grab a bite? or just a drink?
tuv.seg: hm?
¿mm?
it really was him...
así que era él…

tuv.prop: wait, n-no, that’s not what i meant.
HEY man! what are you doing out here?
tuv.seg: i mean, i just like my room a lot-
es que me encanta mi cuarto.

tuv.prop: i didn’t think you’d go as far as to lie about your family like that. at least come up with something believable!
geez, this jerk again. can’t he just leave him alone?
tuv.seg: so if the rumors are true, you must be pretty tough then?
si los rumores son ciertos, debes ser un tipo duro, ¿no?

tuv.prop: don’t put your friends in harm’s way, especially the ones you care about most.
tuv.seg: no matter how careful you think you are...
no importa lo cuidadoso que creas que eres…

tuv.prop: and just when i thought things were gonna be different this time.
it’s been two months since i moved back into the city.
tuv.seg: well, shame on me, i guess. so much for having a great night...
supongo que es mi culpa. hasta aquí llegó mi noche de diversión…

tuv.prop: it’s been awhile since i last went on a date with anyone.
tuv.seg: the last one i agreed to meet didn’t even bother showing.
el tipo con el que acepté encontrarme ni siquiera apareció.

tuv.prop: wow, yeah, you’re right. you were like a baby back then...
are you just visiting? i thought you left the city for good.
tuv.seg: i was not a baby.
no era un bebé.

tuv.prop: did i just ask her out?
tuv.seg: okay, sure! the city is a lot different now, maybe you can start by showing me your favourite place around here?
¡claro, seguro! la ciudad es muy diferente ahora. podrías comenzar por mostrarme tu lugar favorito.

tuv.prop: ah, we take tea very seriously in this house.
tuv.seg: yo, if tea at home tasted this good, i’d be serving myself a cup every morning!
eey, si el té que tenemos en casa fuera como este, ¡tomaría todas las mañanas!

tuv.prop: you had the choice to come quietly with us, but you chose to make a fuss and now we’re in this mess...
tuv.seg: so if i’m going down, you are coming with me!
si voy a perder, ¡ustedes también perderán!

tuv.prop: you had the choice to come quietly with us...
so if i’m going down, you two are coming with me!
tuv.seg: but you chose to make a fuss and now we’re in this mess...
pero armaste un escándalo y ahora estamos en este lío…

tuv.prop: was i the only one with a horrible hairdo?
what about you then? last i remember, you didn’t even own a comb!
tuv.seg: look, bas was raised by professional hairdressers, you can’t compare your fate with his.
bas fue criado por peluqueros profesionales, no puedes comparar tu suerte con la suya.

tuv.prop: geez, don’t worry, it’s just a scratch. besides, i was caught off guard!
tuv.seg: ...look what happened.
… mira lo que pasó.

tuv.prop: oh! just... nice people to hang out with?
tuv.seg: well, you’re unlikely to find any of them at this hour...
mmm, no creo que la encuentres a esta hora…

tuv.prop: we haven’t seen a crowd like that in a long time!
tuv.seg: i gotta say, Rhea, you seem to attract customers.
rhea, déjame decirte que atraes a los clientes.

tuv.prop: but he shows up with a new bruise every time...
congratulations, you got the whole school’s attention, just like you wanted.
tuv.seg: ohh? hey, look who it is.
¡aah! ey, miren quién es.
...everything.
… todo.
listen, i get why you’re worried, but I’ll be fine! it’s not your job to take care of me.
escucha, entiendo por qué te preocupas, ¡pero estaré bien! no tienes que cuidarme.

tuv.prop: PICK ON SOMEONE YOUR OWN SIZE!
tuv.seg: who the heck-
¿quién diablos…?

tuv.prop: rhea, do i look like a stripper to you?
tuv.seg: and i guess that would make sense, right? why you don’t talk about it, why you’re always out late at night, and how you’re tired all the time-
eso tendría sentido, ¿no? no quieres hablar del tema, sales tarde en la noche y siempre estás cansado…

tuv.prop: and i guess that would make sense, right? why you don’t talk about it, why you’re always out late at night, and how you’re tired all the time-
noooo not at all! i’m just saying it’s a possibility, it’s a compliment!
tuv.seg: rhea, do i look like a stripper to you?
rhea, ¿tengo aspecto de {i>stripper<i}?
so it really was you.
así que eras tú.

tuv.prop: i guess you’ll have to trust me, then.
tuv.seg: yeah...
sí…

tuv.prop: After moving away for a decade, Rhea returns to the bustling city on her quest for independence.
Feelings rekindle as secrets begin to unfold, Rhea soon realizes her childhood friend may not be who she believes him to be, and thus her most cherished relationship is put to the test.
tuv.seg: Things are looking bleak, until she bumps into a familiar face - one she didn't think she would ever see again.
Las cosas no salen bien hasta que encuentra una cara conocida, una que no pensó que volvería a ver.

tuv.prop: the writing on this jacket... it’s your family name, isn’t it?
tuv.seg: wait, you can read that?
aguarda, ¿puedes leer eso?

tuv.prop: it’s been awhile, but i’ve had my suspicions and i never asked.
tuv.seg: so, am i wrong?
¿me equivoco?

tuv.prop: that was the same one from before, wasn’t it?
tuv.seg: that man...
ese tipo…

tuv.prop: i didn’t know where you went, or if you were okay, not even a simple text to let me know you’re fine.
tuv.seg: i know you don’t want to talk about it, but could you at least try to consider how i was feeling too? how scared and worried I was?!
sé que no quieres hablar de eso, pero ¿puedes al menos tratar de entender cómo me sentí? ¡¿lo asustada y preocupada que estaba?!

tuv.prop: the victim was rescued just in time by two unidentified men, now dubbed as the “mysterious anti-heroes”...
hey, that’s the news about the incident from last night, right? did you hear?
tuv.seg: officials believe the two men belong to a local vigilante group with ties to a series of similar incidents that have been occurring in the city for decades...
"las autoridades creen que son parte de un grupo de justicieros vinculados a una serie de incidentes similares que han ocurrido en la ciudad por décadas"…

tuv.prop: besides, you’re still better than a certain someone who flaked on us.
so let me guess, you were out late last night. work stuff again?
tuv.seg: i’ve got a date! hehe.
¡tengo una cita! je, je.

tuv.prop: usually when he doesn’t come back, he’s just chilling at his fam’s, y’know, the Iekami residence?
tuv.seg: you mean the same place he used to live before?
¿te refieres al lugar donde vivía antes?

tuv.prop: um, sure? and this man is... shiro?
and that jacket, i know it’s not yours.
tuv.seg: i saw you leaving his place just a minute ago. at this hour? you’re not even hiding the fact that you spent the night.
te vi saliendo de su casa hace un instante. ¿{i>a esta hora<i}? ni siquiera ocultas que pasaste la noche ahí.

tuv.prop: so you’re his babysitter now? somehow, that suits you.
so you guys moved in together, huh. what else have you been up to these days?
tuv.seg: i really doubt it.
lo dudo.

tuv.prop: yes, and i’m beginning to think you found a new one behind my back!
so before you even start to make me look bad, think about why that is!
tuv.seg: the only reason why i’d even be with someone else last night was because you failed to show up.
la única razón por la que estuve con él anoche fue porque {i>tú<i} no apareciste.

tuv.prop: either ways, i’ll be back to visit some time, i’m sure of it!
tuv.seg: hm?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: oh, sorry, i don’t think i introduced myself...?
he already told me about you a long time ago.
tuv.seg: that’s okay.
no importa.

tuv.prop: you just had to give my boys a hard time, didn’t you?
tuv.seg: you got in the way of our business that night.
esa noche nos estropeaste el negocio.

tuv.prop: we lost touch when i moved away, so we’re not as close as we could be i guess?
tuv.seg: he hasn’t changed too much though, just looks a little different. i’m surprised we can even recognise each other.
no cambió demasiado, aunque su aspecto ahora es un poco diferente. hasta me sorprende que nos hayamos reconocido.

tuv.prop: y-yeah, i’m fine, i was just a little spooked...
tuv.seg: sorry about that, i wasn’t looking...
lo lamento, no quise…

tuv.prop: Hi, I'm Steph and I live with my dog.
tuv.seg: stephattyy
stephattyy
oh. um, yeah.
ah, mmm, sí.

tuv.prop: HEY man! what are you doing out here?
tuv.seg: gonna introduce me to your special friend?
¿me presentas a tu amiga especial?
please stay back and call an ambulance.
mantente alejada y llama a una ambulancia.
you can toss it out. ciao.
puedes tirarlo. {i>ciao<i}.

tuv.prop: geez, this jerk again. can’t he just leave him alone?
oi, show some respect! i’m talking to you!
tuv.seg: go on then, prove it. show us what you can do, or are you too scared?
vamos, demuéstralo. a ver qué puedes hacer, ¿o tienes miedo?

tuv.prop: mm, no idea what you’re talking about.
tuv.seg: young man, you are not pulling this on me again-
muchacho, no me hagas esto de nuevo…

tuv.prop: ah, it’s okay! i’ll get this one.
it’s okay, i insist! treat it as a thank you for dinner yesterday.
tuv.seg: naw, rhea, you don’t have to do that!
¡no, rhea, no es necesario!

tuv.prop: i... don’t know what to say, it’s a lot to take in, but after that big scare this morning, i’m just relieved you’re okay.
tuv.seg: thank you for telling me all this.
gracias por decírmelo.

tuv.prop: give yourself a few more years and all that sugar just gets you a doctor’s appointment!
tuv.seg: heh, you’re lucky you’ve still got the age advantage.
je, tienes suerte de ser joven. eso es una ventaja.

tuv.prop: it is your recklessness that made us lose our insurance, have you learned nothing over the years?!
tuv.seg: ow! stop it, ow!
¡ay! para, ¡ay!

tuv.prop: but he didn’t show anyway, so it doesn’t matter-
maybe your uh... girlfriend is calling?
tuv.seg: ah, it’s pretty late. do you have to go?
ah, es bastante tarde. ¿debes irte?
ooh, wait, i think i know what this is about...

tuv.prop: the law is manmade anyway. they are just a set of rules decided by some old guys to keep things in order.
that doesn’t make you a criminal, does it?
tuv.seg: most of them make sense, but sometimes doing the right thing requires you to bend the rules a little.
la mayoría tienen sentido, pero a veces hay que cambiarlas un poco para hacer lo correcto.

tuv.prop: i didn’t know where you went, or if you were okay, not even a simple text to let me know you’re alive.
tuv.seg: i know you don’t want to talk about it, but could you at least try to consider how i was feeling too? how scared and worried I was?!
sé que no quieres hablar de eso, pero ¿puedes al menos tratar de entender cómo me sentí? ¡¿lo asustada y preocupada que estaba?!

tuv.prop: now that you know the truth, do you really like who i am...
because that version of me you hold on to, the one you said goodbye to at the carnival... he’s not here anymore.
tuv.seg: ...or are you just clinging onto the past?
… o solo te estás aferrando al {b>pasado<b}?

tuv.prop: relax girl, it’s all chill! there’s plenty of room for ya.
tuv.seg: besides, you’re clearly in very good hands.
además, es obvio que estabas en buenas manos.

tuv.prop: he’s doing great, still loud, hard to miss. we’re housemates now, actually.
can’t tell if she’s serious, though.
tuv.seg: his mum does my hair all the time. in exchange, i have to make sure he eats his vegetables, i think.
su madre es quien me peina. a cambio, me pide que me asegure de que él coma verduras.

tuv.prop: i was so busy with becky that i didn’t stop to think about you-
tuv.seg: d-don’t say it like that...
n-no lo digas de ese modo…

tuv.prop: because that version of me you hold on to, the one you said goodbye to at the carnival... he’s not here anymore.
that night... when i saw you again, a part of me knew things have changed.
tuv.seg: yeah... you’re right.
sí, tienes razón.

tuv.prop: well, yeah. i just help out with a family business. it’s nothing special.
aw, c’mon, it can’t be that bad. i wanna hear it!
tuv.seg: i wouldn’t bore you with the details, really.
no te aburriré con los detalles.
somebody help me!
¡que alguien me ayude!

tuv.prop: maybe we could get some snacks first!
tuv.seg: you look like you could use some vitamin c
te vendría bien un poco de vitamina c.

tuv.prop: he was here before you arrived, if you go after him now you can still catch him!
tuv.seg: okay, okay, we’ll do our best-
bien, haremos lo que podamos…

tuv.prop: yeah, just about an hour ago.
tuv.seg: ay man, didn’t hear you come in, when did you get back?
eh, viejo, no te escuché entrar, ¿cuándo volviste?

tuv.prop: ...i thought i felt something on his shoulder...
tuv.seg: when i placed my arm around him....
cuando lo abracé…

tuv.prop: hey... that’s the kid everyone is talking about, right?
tuv.seg: guess i’ll just leave this here then...
entonces la dejaré aquí…

tuv.prop: last time we spoke, it didn’t sound like you were ever coming back.
tuv.seg: are you just visiting? i thought you left the city for good.
¿estás de visita? creí que te habías ido de la ciudad para siempre.

tuv.prop: we’ll try to find him, but you have to come with us right now, okay? you’re hurt too.
he was here before you arrived, if you go after him now you can still catch him!
tuv.seg: b-but!
¡p-pero…!

tuv.prop: yeah, it’s been awhile, you look the same!
tuv.seg: bruh, and you were not kidding when you said she is cute now!
amigo, ¡no bromeabas cuando dijiste que ahora es preciosa!

tuv.prop: what kind of boyfriend disappears and just shows up only when it’s convenient?!
tuv.seg: you’re ALWAYS busy, but he was here the minute i called him. he’d drop everything to be here with me, but you?
siempre estás ocupado, pero él vino corriendo cuando lo llamé. dejaría todo para estar conmigo, ¿y tú?

tuv.prop: we’re hired to do things others wouldn’t do, all the dirty work... jobs that need to be handled in secret.
tuv.seg: i belong to a family of vigilantes.
somos una familia de justicieros.
where are you?
¿dónde estás?

tuv.prop: you just want grand kids, don’t you?
i was giving you some genuine advice, how dare you accuse me of such selfish desires, i’m hurt!
tuv.seg: EH?!

tuv.prop: hah, no! i’m just a friend! we used to go to school together, that’s all!
i don’t actually know if it was him, but i’m quite sure it was. i’ve been trying to reach him all night but he hasn’t responded.
tuv.seg: um, i don’t really know how to say this, but i think i bumped into him last night and saw he got into an accident...
eh, no sé muy bien cómo decir esto, pero creo que me crucé con él anoche y vi que tuvo un accidente…
hm?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: the cops call them criminals, and some people think they’re inspiring more violence than saving lives...
tuv.seg: but the way i see it, they wouldn’t exist if there wasn’t a need for them in the first place.
pero mi opinión es que no existirían si no fueran necesarios.

tuv.prop: his mum does my hair all the time. in exchange, i have to make sure he eats his vegetables, i think.
so you’re his babysitter now? somehow, that suits you.
tuv.seg: can’t tell if she’s serious, though.
pero no sé si lo dice en serio.

tuv.prop: yeah, so i knew something was up.
wait, so you actually think he was cheating on you with ME?
tuv.seg: a man his age, with that build, why would he be tired all the time unless he is spending all his energy with another girl?!
un hombre joven y en buen estado físico ¿por qué estaría siempre cansado? ¡la única explicación es que gastara su energía {b>con otra<b}!

tuv.prop: it can get a little rowdy, so it’s not surprising that he wanted to move out. no hard feelings.
tuv.seg: oh-
oh-

tuv.prop: now, regarding our surprise house guests...
you will need to think very carefully about your decisions from now on.
tuv.seg: involving innocent civilians in our family’s business is not ideal, regardless of what they may mean to you.
es mala idea involucrar a civiles inocentes en los negocios familiares, más allá de lo que signifiquen para ti.
aw man, why am i always the side character?
¿por qué siempre soy el personaje secundario?

tuv.prop: i like who you are now, too.
shiro! sweet baby jesus you’re ALIVE!

tuv.seg: ¿mm?

tuv.prop: so... i’ll see you later? just be careful.
you have a long shift at work tomorrow, don’t you?
tuv.seg: don’t worry, it’s a simple job.
no te preocupes, solo es trabajo.
i can’t hold it in any longer.
ya no me aguanto.

tuv.prop: oh. he said all that to you?
a man his age, with that build, why would he be tired all the time unless he is spending all his energy with another girl?!
tuv.seg: yeah, so i knew something was up.
sí. entonces supe que pasaba algo.

tuv.prop: oh... i don’t really think about that. it’s a job, i guess.
tuv.seg: so do you like what you do?
¿y te gusta hacer eso?

tuv.prop: i know you don’t want to talk about it, but could you at least try to consider how i was feeling too? how scared and worried I was?!
i’m sorry, i just… i didn’t know what to say. i thought i was protecting you.

tuv.seg: yo…

tuv.prop: oi, show some respect! i’m talking to you!
tuv.seg: hey!
¡oye!

tuv.prop: i wonder if i made shiro uncomfortable...
tuv.seg: i should’ve left after the movie!
¡debí irme después de la película!

tuv.prop: you have a long shift at work tomorrow, don’t you?
tuv.seg: get some rest. i’ll talk to you soon. see ya.
descansa. te llamaré pronto. adiós.
...huh?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: did you guys find anyone else at the scene?
tuv.seg: there’s the little girl that came with you. she’s doing fine, and we also managed to reunite her with her father.
solo a la niña que vino contigo. ella está bien y ya se ha encontrado con su padre.

tuv.prop: i don’t know how much you know about the outskirts, but my mom said there’s a lot to do there too. it’ll be different!
of course! maybe your family might drop by during a road trip.
tuv.seg: i can visit you?
¿puedo visitarte?

tuv.prop: not exactly. i still don’t know if i should be rooting for them.
they... break the law, and that makes them criminals, right?
tuv.seg: and why is that?
¿y por qué?

tuv.prop: listen, did shiro come home last night?
tuv.seg: duh, i’m literally talking to you. why are you calling at this hour?
estoy hablando contigo, ¿no? ¿por qué llamas a esta hora?

tuv.prop: huh. he’s still not back yet?
tuv.seg: i wanna return the shirt i borrowed. i swear it’s squeaky clean this time!
te devuelvo la camisa que me prestaste. ¡juro que esta vez está limpia!

tuv.prop: duh, i’m literally talking to you. why are you calling at this hour?
last night? no, i just thought he was with you.
tuv.seg: listen, did shiro come home last night?
escucha, ¿shiro regresó a casa anoche?

tuv.prop: the last time you mentioned her, you didn’t sound too happy.
tuv.seg: i just wanted to make sure you’re fine.
solo quiero saber cómo estás.
yeah, don’t sweat it! i think you’re alright.
¡lo sé, no te preocupes! creo que eres buen tipo.
and you... hisao.
y tú, hisao.

tuv.prop: shiro, all the news i’ve been seeing, the vigilantes they’ve been reporting about…
tuv.seg: that’s you, isn’t it?
son ustedes, ¿verdad?

tuv.prop: rhea, you’re not supposed to be here. did my dad let you in?
shiro, i’ve been trying to reach you for hours!
tuv.seg: wait, what do you mean “supposed to”?
espera, ¿qué quieres decir con "se supone"?

tuv.prop: a total of 17 men were captured and charged with assault, all of whom were injured at the scene.
the rumored vigilante, who some believe is a work of fiction, has been making headlines in a series of similar incidents.
tuv.seg: A bystander claims that the two victims were rescued just in time by a mysterious man dressed in black, who disappeared as soon as help arrived.
"un transeúnte afirma que las víctimas fueron rescatadas justo a tiempo por un hombre misterioso vestido de negro, que desapareció cuando llegó la ayuda".

tuv.prop: gosh... i know people can change, but he was so different when we were younger...
tuv.seg: who is that?
¿quién es?

tuv.prop: a-ah, um... sorry, what were we talking about?
tuv.seg: i...forgot. it wasn’t important, i guess...
l-lo olvidé. supongo que no era importante…
you fell asleep again.
te volviste a dormir.

tuv.prop: right, it’s getting kind of late. i’ll help you clean up before i get going.
tuv.seg: yeah. sure.
sí, claro.

tuv.prop: maybe it isn’t so awkward for me to take off now?
tuv.seg: guess i’ll just pretend i didn’t hear anything.
haré como que no escuché nada.
i’m going to tell her...
le diré…
what about the man?
¿y el hombre?

tuv.prop: all this time when you were out late at night, and when you don’t come home, when you disappear for days without a warning…
tuv.seg: so let me get this straight...
a ver si lo estoy entendiendo…

tuv.prop: well, i can respect the craft. that’s how my ma is like with hair!
tuv.seg: god forbid anyone have a bad hair day under her roof, you’ll never hear the end of it!
que el cielo no permita que alguien vaya a su casa despeinado, ¡no para de quejarse!

tuv.prop: please get in and sit tight.
i got the girl, she’s wounded but nothing too serious. she mentioned another man who ran off-
tuv.seg: a nurse will be with you soon.
pronto vendrá una enfermera.

tuv.prop: hmm, okay. i’ll take your word for it.
tuv.seg: no, i’m not seeing anyone... not anymore.
no, ya no salgo con nadie.

tuv.prop: tch. don’t pretend like you don’t know who i am.
...and you appear to be the only one who has all the answers.
tuv.seg: i hope you’re not in a hurry, cuz i have a few questions about a man i was seeing...
ojalá no estés apurada, porque tengo varias preguntas sobre el hombre con el que salía…

tuv.prop: i...no, you can stay. please stay.
so you two go way back, then?
tuv.seg: i didn’t mean to be short, i just...
no quería ser cortante, solo…

tuv.prop: i wasn’t exactly planning to move back here, but there’s just so much more to do in the city for younger ones like us, y’know?
the city is so different now. i know it hasn’t been too long, but i forgot how it was like being here and i was nervous for awhile.
tuv.seg: though... it’s just me this time. i wasn’t sure if i was going to stick around, if i’m being honest.
aunque… esta vez estoy sola. para ser sincera, no estaba segura de si me quedaría.

tuv.prop: hey, kori. i’m sorry for keeping you waiting.
tuv.seg: she deserves to know.
merece saber.

tuv.prop: you weren’t staying over with a girl?
tuv.seg: that’s what you thought all this time?
¿{i>eso<i} es lo que creías?

tuv.prop: it’s been two months since i moved back into the city.
i still haven’t got a proper job and have had no luck meeting anyone new.
tuv.seg: i thought things would start looking up by now, but...
creí que las cosas mejorarían, pero…

tuv.prop: it is, it was! it’s just...
i tried to call you last night, where were you?
tuv.seg: he’s there for me.
él siempre está.

tuv.prop: ah, it’s just a knife accident in the kitchen.
tuv.seg: guess you can’t trust me with one.
no soy confiable cuando uso uno.
the writing on this jacket... it’s your family name, isn’t it?
la escritura en la chaqueta… es tu apellido, ¿verdad?
oh!
¡ah!
oh, someone’s here?
oh, ¿hay alguien?

tuv.prop: but the more i know him, the less i do.
shiro is not who you think he is. he’s dangerous.
tuv.seg: look, people change. i know you two are childhood friends or whatever, but if you weren’t so hopelessly sentimental, maybe you can gain a better perspective.
mira, la gente cambia. sé que son amigos de la infancia, o lo que sea, pero si no fueras tan ridículamente emocional, te darías cuenta de cómo son las cosas.

tuv.prop: kori, you knew i was busy, i told you i was at work. it’s not something i can skip when i want to.
tuv.seg: i got your text and still and came to see you as soon as i could-
recibí tu mensaje y vine a verte tan pronto como pude.
oh no, it’s fine! but you were really tired, couldn’t you ask for a night off? maybe you could get some rest.
¡oh, está bien! pero estás muy cansado, ¿no podrías pedir una noche libre? necesitas dormir.

tuv.prop: though... it’s just me this time. i wasn’t sure if i was going to stick around, if i’m being honest.
but i’m getting used to it, i think, and it’s nice to see a familiar face again...
tuv.seg: the city is so different now. i know it hasn’t been too long, but i forgot how it was like being here and i was nervous for awhile.
la ciudad es muy diferente ahora. aún hace poco que llegué, pero había olvidado cómo era vivir aquí y me he sentido algo nerviosa.

tuv.prop: the shiro i knew before wouldn’t have told me any of the things you just did.
tuv.seg: i like who you’ve become.
… que me gusta quien eres ahora.

tuv.prop: i got the girl, she’s wounded but nothing too serious. she mentioned another man who ran off-
tuv.seg: if he can run, he must be fine. help these other men first!
si puede correr, debe estar bien. ¡ayuden a estos primero!

tuv.prop: i hope you’re not in a hurry, cuz i have a few questions about a man i was seeing...
tuv.seg: ...and you appear to be the only one who has all the answers.
… y tú pareces ser la única que tiene todas las respuestas.

tuv.prop: he was acting so distant, especially during our last few months together.
oh. he said all that to you?
tuv.seg: he kept giving me excuses, saying he has a lot on his plate, or that he needed time for himself.
siempre me daba excusas. decía que estaba ocupado o que necesitaba tiempo para hacer sus cosas.

tuv.prop: i didn’t even know of your existence until i saw the two of you outside that cafe the other day.
i know he can be a little hard to read, i... feel the same way too.
tuv.seg: but hey, since you were the one dating him, shouldn’t you know him better than i do?
pero, oye, tú eras la que salía con él, ¿no deberías conocerlo mejor que yo?

tuv.prop: but if someone is in trouble and you could do something about it, are you supposed to just watch?
tuv.seg: it depends. some people think that’s the safer thing to do. you won’t put your life at risk, and sometimes...
depende. algunas personas creen que es lo más seguro. no arriesgas tu vida y, a veces…

tuv.prop: i can’t hold it in any longer.
tuv.seg: alright, let’s catch them quickly.
bien, atrapémoslas rápido.

tuv.prop: listen, i get why you’re worried, but I’ll be fine! it’s not your job to take care of me.
tuv.seg: i know that, but...
lo sé, pero…
hey, these girls are a pain, don’t you think so?
oye, estas chicas son un fastidio, ¿no crees?

tuv.prop: ...looked like you had so much to say.
tuv.seg: i wish i’d known sooner.
ojalá lo hubiera sabido antes.

tuv.prop: so for your sake, i’d stay as far away as possible.
tuv.seg: trust me. he’s not worth it.
créeme. no vale la pena.

tuv.prop: but you must first be strong enough to control your emotions. until then...
tuv.seg: you are not fit to carry out your duties. you need more training.
… no eres apto para cumplir con tus deberes. necesitas más entrenamiento.

tuv.prop: he wouldn’t have had the guts to tell me how he feels, or look me in the eye when he does it.
and hey, maybe you can also get to know me?
tuv.seg: you’re not who you used to be, you’re better, and i think i’d like to get to know you all over again.
no eres quien eras, eres mejor, y creo que me gustaría volver a conocerte.

tuv.prop: tch, this isn’t fun anymore. let’s go.
i ain’t ready to meet jesus, man!
tuv.seg: OH THANK GOD.
{b>uf, menos mal.<b}

tuv.prop: okay, i’ll try there then. thanks bas!
tuv.seg: ay, wait!
¡eh, espera!

tuv.prop: the old man is not always right, you know.
no no, i’m a special old man, i’m limited edition. it’s different.
tuv.seg: but... you’re my old man.
pero… tú eres mi viejo.
those two have been in there for awhile.
han estado ahí un buen rato.

tuv.prop: because that version of me you hold on to, the one you said goodbye to at the carnival...
tuv.seg: ...he’s not here anymore.
ya no existe.

tuv.prop: i thought she didn’t work on sundays?
tuv.seg: so... are you gonna tell her or nah?
entonces… ¿se lo dirás o no?

tuv.prop: just gotta make sure they are right where they need to be.
so do you like what you do?
tuv.seg: i see.
ya veo.
that is all. you are dismissed.
eso es todo. pueden irse.

tuv.prop: dude, what are you even talking about-
tuv.seg: i-i got a call from rhea this morning, then i checked the news and saw the incident last night and you didn’t come home and i should’ve called to check but i was so tired so i went to bed instead-
r-rhea me llamó esta mañana y vi las noticias y salió el incidente de anoche y no volviste a casa y debería haberte llamado para saber qué pasaba, pero estaba tan cansado que me fui a dormir…

tuv.prop: about the incident last night, you went rogue.
tuv.seg: shiro, i’m sure you know what we need to talk about.
shiro, seguro sabes de qué tenemos que hablar.
it’s not what it looks like...
no es lo que parece…

tuv.prop: yeah, but if jae and pascoal finish their game early, they’ll join us too!
at least six men were responsible for the attack last night, all who have been identified as members of a criminal gang that have been terrorising the city.
tuv.seg: ...reporting another incident of gang violence...
"… informamos de otro incidente de violencia de pandillas…"

tuv.prop: though let’s be real, judging by all that i’m hearing, no one has got anything on these guys.
hey, what happened to your hand?
tuv.seg: man, what i’d do to see them in action!
¡haría cualquier cosa por verlos en acción!

tuv.prop: would you be upset if i said no?
yeah, but after the night i put you through, you must have some questions.
tuv.seg: of course not, that’s silly.
para nada, no te preocupes.
he’s hurt!
¡está herido!

tuv.prop: but everything about me and my family spells trouble. aren’t you afraid?
but... i also just learned that a good friend of mine can probably take on anyone who tries to come my way.
tuv.seg: i am. i should be.
sí. es lo lógico.

tuv.prop: you could say we provide a service, and everyone in the family are a part of it. i just mostly work the night shift.
tuv.seg: so you provide a service... at night?
entonces, ¿provees un servicio… nocturno?
shiro.
shiro.
REUNION
reencuentro

tuv.prop: what about you then? last i remember, you didn’t even own a comb!
tuv.seg: i don’t know what to tell you, rhea. apparently the hair thing runs in the family.
no sé qué decirte, rhea. parece que el asunto del cabello viene de familia.

tuv.prop: PICK ON SOMEONE YOUR OWN SIZE!
tch, this isn’t fun anymore. let’s go.
tuv.seg: oh you have got to be kidding me.
debes estar bromeando.

tuv.prop: man, i don’t know. on one hand, i can see why people want them gone...
tuv.seg: hmm?
¿mmm?

tuv.prop: ooh, wait, i think i know what this is about...
don’t worry son, the men in this family have a history of being successful romantics. plus, you’ve inherited my good looks which is a massive advantage.
tuv.seg: don’t change the subject.
no cambies de tema.

tuv.prop: ah... it’s been over twenty minutes. what could they be talking about for so long?
tuv.seg: en_US
es_LATAM

tuv.prop: but we could always do this some other time, cuz it’s not like i’m going anywhere anytime soon, unless you’re leaving this time-
tuv.seg: rhea.
rhea.

tuv.prop: Things are looking bleak, until she bumps into a familiar face - one she didn't think she would ever see again.
tuv.seg: After moving away for a decade, Rhea returns to the bustling city on her quest for independence.
Después de haber vivido lejos durante una década, Rhea regresa a la bulliciosa ciudad en su búsqueda de independencia.

tuv.prop: i mean, my hair is pretty cool too, though. the best part is it stays in shape rain or shine, talk about structural integrity!
tuv.seg: i totally dig your hair by the way, what’s your secret?
por cierto, me encanta tu peinado, ¿cuál es tu secreto?

tuv.prop: oh, that. i forgot about it.
the last one i agreed to meet didn’t even bother showing.
tuv.seg: it’s been awhile since i last went on a date with anyone.
ha pasado tiempo desde la última vez que salí con alguien.
well, can’t help it. i guess my boy is really a man now.
bien, es la vida. supongo que mi muchacho ya es un hombre.

tuv.prop: i wasn’t ready for you to see me like this.
tuv.seg: by the WAY, RHEA...
a propósito, rhea…

tuv.prop: i still haven’t got a proper job and have had no luck meeting anyone new.
tuv.seg: sorry, you’re not a good fit for our company.
lo siento, no eres la candidata idónea para nosotros.

tuv.prop: the one by the lake? i think so.
tuv.seg: hey,do you still have the photos from the last field trip we took together?
oye, ¿aún tienes las fotos de la última excursión que hicimos?

tuv.prop: hey man! i was just returning the shirt i borrowed the last time. didn’t know you were out, my bad.
tuv.seg: shiro?
¿shiro?

tuv.prop: i don’t wanna butt in, but you know why i’m asking, right?
tuv.seg: hey, so... are you and kori... good?
oye, y… kori y tú… ¿va todo bien?

tuv.prop: pfft... wow, you really are a tough cookie, aren’t ya?
so if i’m going down, you are coming with me!
tuv.seg: you had the choice to come quietly with us, but you chose to make a fuss and now we’re in this mess...
pudiste venir calladita con nosotros, pero armaste un escándalo y ahora estamos en este lío…

tuv.prop: you’re not who you used to be, you’re better, and i think i’d like to get to know you all over again.
so let’s start all over again, from the beginning, sound good?
tuv.seg: and hey, maybe you can also get to know me?
y quizá tú también puedas conocerme a mí.
ART ASSISTANTS
asistentes de arte

tuv.prop: it’s just the three of us though...
tuv.seg: so consider tonight as an early celebration to your new job! y’know, the one you’re about to get.
entonces, ¡esta noche haremos una celebración anticipada por tu nuevo trabajo! ya casi lo consigues.

tuv.prop: ...even when it comes with a price.
tuv.seg: it involves doing dangerous tasks many won’t understand...
implica realizar actividades peligrosas que muchos no entienden…

tuv.prop: yeah! i never noticed that about you. i bet girls like you for that.
tuv.seg: not really...
en realidad, no…

tuv.prop: y’know, you never really told me what your job is. what does your family do, exactly?

i know your shift is over, but max is running a little late. mind holding the fort in the meantime?

tuv.prop: i thought it was just some silly rumour.
wait, you mean they are real?
tuv.seg: yeah, i thought so too. so all the crimes you’ve been hearing about? apparently, they are being taken care of by these so called “fictional heroes.”

tuv.prop: rhea. are you sure you don’t mind if i take off first?

tuv.prop: ...even when it comes with a price.
