yeah, but i didn’t care about it at all, because right after that-
tuv.seg: wait, you got stood up?
espera, {i>¿te plantó?<i}

tuv.prop: um, so, thanks for last night!
tuv.seg: OH, yeah, no problem-
sí, claro, de nada…

tuv.prop: no, i don’t think so. we don’t do that sort of stuff.
either ways, i’ll be back to visit some time, i’m sure of it!
tuv.seg: hey, don’t worry!
¡oye, no te preocupes!
hah, you... you’re the one who was at the shop that day.
ja, tú… tú eras el que estaba en la tienda ese día.

tuv.prop: no, you ate it all, remember?
tuv.seg: ay yo, we got anymore dip in the fridge?
oye, ¿tenemos aderezo en el refrigerador?

tuv.prop: geez, don’t worry, it’s just a scratch. besides, i was caught off guard!
not to scare you, but i don’t think that one training camp ten years ago is enough to cut it...
tuv.seg: i could’ve dropped a pretty mean punch, y’know.
podría haberles dado un buen puñetazo, ¿sabes?
um... sorry, is there a reason why you’re asking? have we met by any chance?
mmm… lo siento, ¿lo preguntas por algo? ¿nos conocemos?

tuv.prop: of course! maybe your family might drop by during a road trip.
no, i don’t think so. we don’t do that sort of stuff.
tuv.seg: oh. my family?
ah… ¿mi familia?

tuv.prop: and you appear to be the only one who has all the answers.
i saw you leaving his place just a minute ago. at this hour? you’re not even hiding the fact that you spent the night.
tuv.seg: um, sure? and this man is... shiro?
mm, ¿segura? ¿te refieres a… shiro?
mm-hmm, that’s definitely a girl.
ajá, sí. sin duda es una chica.
he’s one of them.
es uno de {i>ellos<i}.

tuv.prop: involving innocent civilians in our family’s business is not ideal, regardless of what they may mean to you.
don’t put your friends in harm’s way, especially the ones you care about most.
tuv.seg: you will need to think very carefully about your decisions from now on.
desde ahora, tendrás que considerar cuidadosamente tus decisiones.

tuv.prop: well, you remember way back when there were rumors of this mob family going around?
i thought it was just some silly rumour.
tuv.seg: oh yeah, kids at school used to talk about that a lot.
sí, en la escuela los niños solían mencionarlo.

tuv.prop: aw, work stuff again? well, you still gotta eat!
tuv.seg: actually, i’ve got something to do later.
yo sí tengo algo que hacer más tarde.

tuv.prop: i mean... i was never honest with you before, i was never honest with anyone, and look where that got me.
shiro, all the news i’ve been seeing, the vigilantes they’ve been reporting about…
tuv.seg: but still, this is really hard for me, and i don’t want things to change between us.
pero, aún así, esto es muy difícil para mí y no quiero que las cosas cambien entre nosotros.
rhea...?
¿rhea…?

tuv.prop: i’m serious! no one aside from the witnesses would know how they look like, but even so, it’s pretty vague.
but the way i see it, they wouldn’t exist if there wasn’t a need for them in the first place.
tuv.seg: the cops call them criminals, and some people think they’re inspiring more violence than saving lives...
los policías los llaman criminales, y algunos piensan que es más la violencia que despiertan que las vidas que salvan…

tuv.prop: don’t worry son, the men in this family have a history of being successful romantics. plus, you’ve inherited my good looks which is a massive advantage.
you think everyone is in love with me.
tuv.seg: i for one think she’s in love with you.
yo opino que está enamorada de ti.
i’ll be outside.
estaré afuera.

tuv.prop: Last night at approximately 10:15 pm, two victims, a woman and a child, were attacked by members belonging to a notorious gang that are known for violent crimes.
tuv.seg: en_US
es_LATAM

tuv.prop: fine, say we got all that covered, you’re still... okay with being around someone like me?.
tuv.seg: huh? why wouldn’t i be?
¿por qué no lo estaría?

tuv.prop: sometimes i think maybe i should have, but if i did…
tuv.seg: y’know, he said the same thing to me twenty-three years ago, and I never listened.
¿sabes?, él me dijo lo mismo hace veintitrés años y no le hice caso.

tuv.prop: you both have been too negligent with your responsibilities.
tuv.seg: nah. i’m good.
prefiero ver.

tuv.prop: hey kid, have you had your five a day?
you look like you could use some vitamin c
tuv.seg: maybe we could get some snacks first!
¡podríamos buscar algo para comer!

tuv.prop: i for one think she’s in love with you.
tuv.seg: you think everyone is in love with me.
tú opinas que {bi>todas<bi} lo están.
hey man! i was just returning the shirt i borrowed the last time. didn’t know you were out, my bad.
¡hola, viejo! vine a devolverte la camisa que me prestaste. no sabía que no estabas, lo siento.

tuv.prop: ah. suddenly i don’t want this anymore...
even i know this isn’t the most lavish place for lovebirds to meet-
tuv.seg: don’t worry, it’s on the house! we don’t get many customers like yourself anymore.
¡no te preocupes, invita la casa! ya no quedan muchos clientes como tú.

tuv.prop: she’s the one you talked about, right? the one you bumped into a couple of months ago.
young man, you are not pulling this on me again-
tuv.seg: mm, no idea what you’re talking about.
mm, no sé de qué me hablas.

tuv.prop: he was acting so distant, especially during our last few months together.
tuv.seg: the what-?
¿la qué…?

tuv.prop: right, it’s getting kind of late. i’ll help you clean up before i get going.
tuv.seg: oh, you don’t have to worry about that. i’ll walk you home.
ah, no es necesario. te acompañaré a casa.

tuv.prop: it can get a little rowdy, so it’s not surprising that he wanted to move out. no hard feelings.
tuv.seg: hm? did shiro not tell you? most of the family live here. that’s three generations, by the way.
¿shiro no te lo dijo? la mayor parte de la familia vive aquí. ya somos tres generaciones.

tuv.prop: it’s in my blood, and i can’t erase that.
deep down, i know it’s just easier to let them go than to watch them run when they know the truth.
tuv.seg: i guess this is my reality, and as much as i’ve wished for someone to understand...
supongo que es lo que me toca, y por mucho que desee que alguien lo comprenda…

tuv.prop: i-i mean, you’ve seen the news, it’s not safe around here.{j}I’m just doing my part, don’t mention it.
tuv.seg: aww, really? thanks!
aay, ¿en serio? ¡gracias!

tuv.prop: i... don’t know what to say, it’s a lot to take in, but after that big scare this morning, i’m just relieved you’re okay.
tuv.seg: yeah, but... everything about me and my family spells trouble. aren’t you afraid?
pero todo lo que nos rodea garantiza problemas. ¿no tienes miedo?

tuv.prop: hang on, rhea, i know you’re eager to leave
tuv.seg: finally. am i cleared yet?
por fin. ¿me puedo ir?

tuv.prop: okay, sure! the city is a lot different now, maybe you can start by showing me your favourite place around here?
wait, n-no, that’s not what i meant.
tuv.seg: yeah. my bedroom.
sería mi habitación.

tuv.prop: y’know, the one from the news today?
tuv.seg: oh.
ah.

tuv.prop: hey, so... are you and kori... good?
the last time you mentioned her, you didn’t sound too happy.
tuv.seg: i don’t wanna butt in, but you know why i’m asking, right?
no quiero entrometerme, pero sabes por qué te lo pregunto.

tuv.prop: c’mon, can’t you tell? man, think of all the chances you missed!
tuv.seg: wait, girls like me?
aguarda, ¿en serio?

tuv.prop: do not make me waste another sunday morning for this purpose ever again, or you will be praying for your death.
tuv.seg: y-yes sir...
s-sí señor…

tuv.prop: though let’s be real, judging by all that i’m hearing, no one has got anything on these guys.
tuv.seg: sure.
claro.

tuv.prop: i noticed you got some scratches again, thought it’d be good to have that covered!
tuv.seg: here.
toma.

tuv.prop: did it not_x0003_occur to you that i simply wasn’t checking my phone at this hour, maybe i was asleep?
i didn’t know where you went, or if you were okay, not even a simple text to let me know you’re alive.
tuv.seg: asleep? you were hurt, and you ran off before anyone could help you!
¿durmiendo? ¡estabas herido y huiste antes de que pudieran ayudarte!

tuv.prop: rhea... i think you’re thinking too hard about this...
tuv.seg: well, you remember bas, right?
bueno, te acuerdas de bas, ¿verdad?
it really is him...
… de verdad es él…

tuv.prop: nothing at all, really! we haven’t spoken to each other as much as we used to, and i guess i’m just trying to reconnect?
i didn’t know where you went, or if you were okay, not even a simple text to let me know you’re fine.
tuv.seg: asleep? you were hurt, and you ran off before anyone could help you!
¿durmiendo? ¡estabas herido y huiste antes de que pudieran ayudarte!

tuv.prop: he kept giving me excuses, saying he has a lot on his plate, or that he needed time for himself.
yeah, so i knew something was up.
tuv.seg: oh. he said all that to you?
ah, ¿eso te decía?

tuv.prop: most of the time i’m just taking care of a special delivery or dropping people off.
tuv.seg: just gotta make sure they are right where they need to be.
solo tengo que asegurarme de que estén donde deben estar.

tuv.prop: there was a man who was hurt and he fled the scene. did you guys find him?
tuv.seg: hm? what man?
¿mm? ¿qué hombre?
...does rhea know?
¿rhea lo sabe?…

tuv.prop: you can toss it out. ciao.
tuv.seg: hmm...
mmm…

tuv.prop: Last night at approximately 10:15 pm, two victims, a woman and a child, were attacked by members belonging to a notorious gang that are known for violent crimes.
A bystander claims that the two victims were rescued just in time by a mysterious man dressed in black, who disappeared as soon as help arrived.
tuv.seg: a total of 17 men were captured and charged with assault, all of whom were injured at the scene.
"un total de {b>17<b} hombres fueron capturados y acusados por el ataque. todos resultaron heridos en la escena".
you can bring your friends over too if you want! having more girls around wouldn’t hurt... heh.
¡si quieres, trae a tus amigas! no estaría mal que hubiera más chicas por aquí… je.

tuv.prop: honestly. i don’t think i’m built for romance these days.
oh, that. i forgot about it.
tuv.seg: hm, what do you mean? weren’t you on the dating app awhile ago?
mmm, ¿cómo es eso? ¿no estabas en una aplicación de citas?

tuv.prop: god, i need to get out of here.
tuv.seg: shiro...
shiro…

tuv.prop: no, i’m not seeing anyone... not anymore.
tuv.seg: sorry about that.
lo siento.

tuv.prop: though, you’re pretty mysterious, you know that?
yeah! i never noticed that about you. i bet girls like you for that.
tuv.seg: i am?
¿lo soy?

tuv.prop: don’t worry about it, it’s a pretty mundane job.
just gotta make sure they are right where they need to be.
tuv.seg: most of the time i’m just taking care of a special delivery or dropping people off.
por lo general, hago entregas especiales o llevo a la gente a alguna parte.

tuv.prop: what happened last night was real, and i knew i couldn’t hide things from you any longer.
i wasn’t ready to lose you too.
tuv.seg: i was scared you’d never talk to me again and i didn’t know what to say.
me asustó que no volvieras a hablarme, por eso no sabía qué decir.
hey, why’d you look so sad? aren’t you having fun?
oye, tienes cara de triste. ¿no te diviertes?
en_US
es_LATAM

tuv.prop: alright, alright, i’ll check again. but until then, just get some rest, okay?
tuv.seg: wait, when can i leave? you haven’t told me yet-
espere, aún no me ha dicho cuándo puedo irme…

tuv.prop: wait, you can’t be in there-
tuv.seg: oh, phew. you two still look decent-
uf, qué alivio. aún están decentes…
even if you don’t want to talk to me...
aunque no quieras hablar conmigo…

tuv.prop: what the- who the hell are you?!
tuv.seg: wait... this guy...
espera… este tipo…
huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: congratulations, you got the whole school’s attention, just like you wanted.
so if the rumors are true, you must be pretty tough then?
tuv.seg: i didn’t think you’d go as far as to lie about your family like that. at least come up with something believable!
no pensé que llegarías a mentir así sobre tu familia. ¡al menos inventa algo creíble!

tuv.prop: but... i also just learned that a good friend of mine can probably take on anyone who tries to come my way.
but now that you know what i do, if i get caught, they might come for you too, and you’re okay with that?
tuv.seg: so maybe that means i have less to be afraid of, too?
eso significa que también tengo menos que temer, ¿no?

tuv.prop: but everything you just said is not true.
we have never done anything more than that.
tuv.seg: shiro and i are just friends, that’s it. we grew up together, lost touch and only started hanging out again recently.
shiro y yo solo somos amigos. crecimos juntos, perdimos el contacto y hace poco volvimos a vernos.

tuv.prop: i’m not ready yet, you didn’t have to come over.
i’ll just wait for you outside...
tuv.seg: it’s fine. i really wanted to see you.
no hay problema. tenía ganas de verte.

tuv.prop: though it has been almost a decade since i last saw you in person...
tuv.seg: wow, yeah, you’re right. you were like a baby back then...
uy, sí, tienes razón. eras un bebé en aquel entonces…

tuv.prop: oh! i work here, but i guess i never told you that.
tuv.seg: rhea? what are you doing here?
¿rhea? ¿qué haces aquí?

tuv.prop: aw, work stuff again? well, you still gotta eat!
tuv.seg: c’mon, dinner’s on me, it won’t take long!
vamos, yo invito. ¡no será mucho tiempo!

tuv.prop: maybe we can start with that.
those two have been in there for awhile.
tuv.seg: ahh... what an unexpected guest.
aah… qué visitante tan inesperada.

tuv.prop: ...when it feels like i don’t know you at all.
tuv.seg: i didn’t want to doubt you, but it’s getting harder to pretend...
no quiero dudar de ti, pero es difícil ignorar tantas cosas…

tuv.prop: i’m glad we got here early, where should we start?
maybe we could get some snacks first!
tuv.seg: hey kid, have you had your five a day?
oye, chico, ¿comiste hoy tus verduras?
en_US
es_LATAM
… ¿eh?
what...?
¿qué…

tuv.prop: sometimes people see things when they are in shock, and you were hit on the head-
alright, alright, i’ll check again. but until then, just get some rest, okay?
tuv.seg: you don’t understand, i think he was stabbed. he has to be in the hospital somehow.
usted no lo comprende, creo que lo {bi>apuñalaron<bi}. tiene que estar en el hospital.

tuv.prop: they must have an important reason.
and who knows? maybe they can tell me all about it sometime, since i can be pretty nosy and i’m not afraid to admit it!
tuv.seg: so... i guess i’d just tell them to be careful, and to do the right thing, even when it’s hard.
conque… supongo que le diría que tuviera cuidado y que hiciera lo correcto, aunque sea difícil.

tuv.prop: go on ahead! i’ll take care of things from here.
tuv.seg: oh, my youber is here! that’s quick.
¡ah, llegó mi yuber! qué rápido.

tuv.prop: ay yo, we got anymore dip in the fridge?
tuv.seg: ah, can’t be late!
¡uy, ya debo irme!
um...
mm…

tuv.prop: i mean, i just like my room a lot-
gonna introduce me to your special friend?
tuv.seg: HEY man! what are you doing out here?
¡{b>eh, viejo<b}! ¿qué estás haciendo aquí?

tuv.prop: it’s my first real gift to a friend, so take good care of it, okay?
i want you to keep it. and you can give it back to me...
tuv.seg: wait.
espera.

tuv.prop: so what’s with all the questions anyway? was that a test?
y’know i asked you a question first, and you didn’t answer.
tuv.seg: no, i was just curious.
no, solo tenía curiosidad.

tuv.prop: that night, when i saw you again...
tuv.seg: a part of me knew...
una parte de mí supo...

tuv.prop: did it not_x0003_occur to you that i simply wasn’t checking my phone at this hour, maybe i was asleep?
tuv.seg: hm?
¿mm?
y’know i asked you a question first, and you didn’t answer.
pero yo primero te hice una pregunta {i>a ti<i} y no respondiste.

tuv.prop: well, shame on me, i guess. so much for having a great night...
i thought things would start looking up by now, but...
tuv.seg: it’s been two months since i moved back into the city.
ya pasaron dos meses desde que regresé a esta ciudad.

tuv.prop: don’t worry, it’s on the house! we don’t get many customers like yourself anymore.
tuv.seg: even i know this isn’t the most lavish place for lovebirds to meet-
hasta yo sé que este no es el lugar más elegante para unos tortolitos.

tuv.prop: okay, okay, we’ll do our best-
please get in and sit tight.
tuv.seg: huh?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: ah, crap. i shouldn’t be eavesdropping!
tuv.seg: oh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: huh. he’s still not back yet?
tuv.seg: hmm...
mmm…

tuv.prop: oh, my youber is here! that’s quick.
thanks, rhea! i owe ya big time. i’ll see you tomorrow!
tuv.seg: go on ahead! i’ll take care of things from here.
¡vete! yo me ocuparé de cerrar todo.
here, take the whole box, and make sure you use it, okay?
llévate la caja y asegúrate de usarla, ¿de acuerdo?

tuv.prop: so you two go way back, then?
tuv.seg: why don’t you come in and say hi?
¿por qué no entras a saludarlo?

tuv.prop: oh god, i can’t believe i got away with that haircut!
look, bas was raised by professional hairdressers, you can’t compare your fate with his.
tuv.seg: was i the only one with a horrible hairdo?
¿era la única con un peinado horrible?
what we have tonight is urgent.
lo que tenemos hoy es urgente.

tuv.prop: even if you were busy, couldn’t you a least send me a text back?
i got your text and still and came to see you as soon as i could-
tuv.seg: kori, you knew i was busy, i told you i was at work. it’s not something i can skip when i want to.
kori, sabías que tenía que trabajar. no puedo ignorar mi responsabilidad cuando me da la gana.

tuv.prop: sorry, could you repeat yourself? i lost you there.
tuv.seg: i’ll call you...
te llamaré…
that voice...
la voz…

tuv.prop: please stay back and call an ambulance.
tuv.seg: you’re hurt.
estás herida.

tuv.prop: that was the same one from before, wasn’t it?
it is, it was! it’s just...
tuv.seg: you promised me it was over.
me dijiste que había acabado.

tuv.prop: sometimes, we do it to protect the people who need it most.
it involves doing dangerous tasks many won’t understand...
tuv.seg: other times…
otras veces…

tuv.prop: basically, it’s not safe to be out alone anymore.
tuv.seg: i don’t know what you remember, but recently there’s been a lot of... incidents, especially at night.
no sé qué recuerdas, pero últimamente ha habido muchos… incidentes, especialmente por la noche.
i’m sorry. are you okay?
lo siento. ¿estás bien?

tuv.prop: i got the girl, she’s wounded but nothing too serious. she mentioned another man who ran off-
tuv.seg: if he can run, he must be fine. there are a dozen of them laying here, save these men first!
si puede correr, debe estar bien. hay una docena de personas tiradas aquí. ¡atiéndanlas primero!

tuv.prop: no honey, i’m sure it has little to do with the weather...
tuv.seg: actually, i’ll have twenty more of that, thanks.
me llevaré veinte más de esos, gracias.

tuv.prop: you think everyone is in love with me.
tuv.seg: and am i wrong?
¿y me equivoco?

tuv.prop: think of us as a business that runs errands. yeah, that’s it.
y’know, it’s like what you said before, it’s dangerous in the city these days, especially at night.
tuv.seg: oh, okay. so... is it safe?
ah, entiendo. y… ¿es seguro?

tuv.prop: it’s not safe for a girl to be out alone at night...
tuv.seg: y’know, we never got to finish that conversation.
no hemos terminado de hablar.
i have a feeling...
tengo una corazonada…
...i know.
… lo sé.

tuv.prop: were you protecting me, or just trying to protect yourself?
listen, i’m sorry i came uninvited. now that i know you’re fine, i’ll leave.
tuv.seg: you’re always hiding, you never let anyone in, even when someone is trying so hard to understand you, you just... you won’t let them.
siempre te escondes, no dejas que nadie se acerque, incluso cuando alguien se esfuerza tanto por entenderte, simplemente… no lo permites.
that’s his room right there. go on, i’ll leave you to it.
esa es su habitación. ve con él.

tuv.prop: thanks! though all my friends aren’t from the city... but i’ll keep that in mind?
um, so, thanks for last night!
tuv.seg: anyway, i have another shift in a few hours. i should really be going now.
bien, tengo otro turno en unas horas. ya debo irme.

tuv.prop: man, i don’t know. on one hand, i can see why people want them gone...
it depends. some people think that’s the safer thing to do. you won’t put your life at risk, and sometimes...
tuv.seg: but if someone is in trouble and you could do something about it, are you supposed to just watch?
pero si alguien está en problemas y uno puede hacer algo, ¿se supone que debe quedarse mirando?

tuv.prop: but i’m getting used to it, i think, and it’s nice to see a familiar face again...
it depends. what kind of friends?
tuv.seg: y’know, they don’t exactly tell you this, but it’s hard meeting new friends out here.
ya sabes, nadie lo dice, pero es difícil hacer amigos aquí.

tuv.prop: who are you here for? kira? kai?
tuv.seg: oh, sorry dear, i didn’t hear you come in. no one said we were having guests over today!
ah, lo siento. no te escuché entrar. ¡no sabía que tendríamos visitas hoy!

tuv.prop: actually, i’ve got something to do later.
c’mon, dinner’s on me, it won’t take long!
tuv.seg: aw, work stuff again? well, you still gotta eat!
uuf, ¿de nuevo el trabajo? ¡pero tienes que comer!

tuv.prop: okay, i can see how it looks, but i promise you it’s not what you think-
tuv.seg: you wanna know what i think, do you?
¿quieres saber qué creo?
so... that was fun?
mm… estuvo bien, ¿no?

tuv.prop: guess you can’t trust me with one.
tuv.seg: ah, it’s just a knife accident in the kitchen.
nada, un accidente con un cuchillo en la cocina.

tuv.prop: i guess you’re not the same boy i grew up with anymore.
tuv.seg: that night... when i saw you again, a part of me knew things have changed.
la noche que te volví a ver… una parte de mí supo que algo había cambiado.

tuv.prop: yo, Rhea, for real? how’ve you been?
tuv.seg: bas, this is Rhea, you remember her, i mentioned to you a few days ago-
ella es rhea, ¿la recuerdas? te la mencioné hace unos días.

tuv.prop: besides, you’re clearly in very good hands.
so yeah, you can come over and crash anytime! jae and pascoal won’t mind either.
tuv.seg: you’re so loud...
bas, cómo gritas…

tuv.prop: eh, doesn’t matter, you can never have too many dips.
suuure, but i can’t go too crazy, i don’t wanna rock up to an interview looking washed, y’know?
tuv.seg: besides, we’re going hard tonight!
además, ¡será una noche superloca!
leave us alone!
¡déjennos en paz!

tuv.prop: okay, okay, we’ll do our best-
tuv.seg: he was here before you arrived, if you go after him now you can still catch him!
estaba aquí antes de que ustedes llegaran. ¡si lo buscan, lo encontrarán!

tuv.prop: i’m sorry i missed your calls, okay?
asleep? you were hurt, and you ran off before anyone could help you!
tuv.seg: did it not_x0003_occur to you that i simply wasn’t checking my phone at this hour, maybe i was asleep?
¿no se te ocurrió que podría estar durmiendo y que no iba a revisar el teléfono a esa hora?

tuv.prop: think of us as a business that runs errands. yeah, that’s it.
tuv.seg: um, anyway... i guess you could say various people hire us for various reasons?
en fin, se podría decir que las personas nos contratan por distintas razones.

tuv.prop: a moment of silence to support our fellow brother, who, in spite of his romantic challenges, did his best til the very end.
i know everyone was acting cool about the whole thing, but it was still embarrassing to be found like that...
tuv.seg: oh god... that was rough.
oh, cielos… qué embarazoso.

tuv.prop: i hope you’re not in a hurry, cuz i have a few questions about a man i was seeing...
tuv.seg: tch. don’t pretend like you don’t know who i am.
tch. no finjas que ignoras quien soy.

tuv.prop: i totally dig your hair by the way, what’s your secret?
tuv.seg: i mean, my hair is pretty cool too, though. the best part is it stays in shape rain or shine, talk about structural integrity!
mi pelo también es fantástico. lo mejor es que se queda así, pase lo que pase. ja, ¿qué me dices de la integridad estructural?

tuv.prop: i don’t actually know if it was him, but i’m quite sure it was. i’ve been trying to reach him all night but he hasn’t responded.
tuv.seg: i got worried, and our friend hasn’t seen him either. i just wanted to know if he’s okay, that’s all.
me preocupé, y nuestro amigo tampoco lo ha visto. solo deseo saber si está bien.
this hand...!
¡esta mano…!
dude, it’s two against one, we could have knocked him out. why’d you back off?
amigo, somos dos contra uno. podríamos haberlo noqueado. ¿por qué retrocediste?

tuv.prop: so you don’t know anyone here, then?
tuv.seg: not really, aside from an old friend i recently bumped into, literally.
la verdad es que no. solo a un viejo amigo al que encontré hace poco.
we’re done.
terminamos.
until we meet again!
¡hasta el reencuentro!

tuv.prop: rhea, i think you’ve got some competition.
tuv.seg: ooh, they look awfully chummy.
aah, parecen estar muy unidos.

tuv.prop: oh you have got to be kidding me.
tuv.seg: PICK ON SOMEONE YOUR OWN SIZE!
¡métete con uno de tu tamaño!

tuv.prop: the victim, a 16 year-old male, was walking home from a party when he was threatened and wounded from a gunshot.
tuv.seg: at least six men were responsible for the attack last night, all who have been identified as members of a criminal gang that have been terrorising the city.
"al menos seis hombres fueron responsables del ataque de anoche. todos fueron identificados como integrantes de una banda criminal que está aterrorizando a la ciudad".

tuv.prop: don’t you know it’s rude to keep someone waiting for this long?
tuv.seg: um... e-excuse me...?
eh… ¿c-cómo dice?

tuv.prop: of course. you know i don’t lose things.
tuv.seg: mm-hmm, neither do i.
ajá, yo tampoco.

tuv.prop: besides, you’re not together anymore, so why does it matter who he is seeing now?
everything else about him is... off.
tuv.seg: it’s not just who he is seeing, it’s...
no es solo con quién sale, es…

tuv.prop: give yourself a few more years and all that sugar just gets you a doctor’s appointment!
don’t worry, it’s on the house! we don’t get many customers like yourself anymore.
tuv.seg: ah. suddenly i don’t want this anymore...
ah. de repente ya no lo quiero…

tuv.prop: look at it, it defies gravity!
rhea... i think you’re thinking too hard about this...
tuv.seg: the physics... it makes no sense...
la física… no tiene sentido…
please be okay.
por favor… que esté bien.

tuv.prop: we made plans with rhea, right? something about a home movie.
phew. thanks for the reminder! let me grab my jacket real quick.
tuv.seg: oh yeah! man it almost slipped my mind.
¡ah, sí! vaya, casi lo olvido.

tuv.prop: y’know, the one from the news today?
tuv.seg: what do you think about the vigilantes they were talking about?
¿qué opinas sobre los justicieros de los que hablaban?

tuv.prop: we have five men down over here!
tuv.seg: help is here!
¡es la ayuda!

tuv.prop: she’s the one you talked about, right? the one you bumped into a couple of months ago.
tuv.seg: so, that girl, rhea...
esa chica, rhea.
geez, girl, okay. chill out.
caramba, está bien. cálmate.

tuv.prop: everything we’ve done... it’s already in our name.
tuv.seg: we’ve been doing this for so long, even if we tried to do things differently...
lo hemos hecho por tanto tiempo que, incluso si intentáramos cambiar las cosas…
shiro...
shiro…
...rhea?
¿rhea…?

tuv.prop: i could say the same to you.
wow, yeah, you’re right. you were like a baby back then...
tuv.seg: though it has been almost a decade since i last saw you in person...
pasaron casi diez años desde la última vez que nos encontramos…
wait...
espera…

tuv.prop: yeah, the movie ended awhile ago. i guess you were asleep for half of it.
tuv.seg: oh... i did?
¿sí?

tuv.prop: hm, what do you mean? weren’t you on the dating app awhile ago?
it’s been awhile since i last went on a date with anyone.
tuv.seg: oh, that. i forgot about it.
ah, sí. pero ya la dejé.

tuv.prop: geez, don’t worry, it’s just a scratch. besides, it wasn’t even a fair fight!
not to scare you, but i don’t think that one training camp ten years ago is enough to cut it...
tuv.seg: i could’ve dropped a pretty mean punch, y’know.
podría haberles dado un buen puñetazo, ¿sabes?
huh?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: um, i don’t really know how to say this, but i think i bumped into him last night and saw he got into an accident...
i got worried, and our friend hasn’t seen him either. i just wanted to know if he’s okay, that’s all.
tuv.seg: i don’t actually know if it was him, but i’m quite sure it was. i’ve been trying to reach him all night but he hasn’t responded.
no estoy {i>segura<i} de si era shiro, pero creo que sí. he tratado de comunicarme con él por horas, pero no responde.

tuv.prop: but the more i know him, the less i do.
tuv.seg: hmph, and to think a year ago when we started dating, i thought i was finally getting to know him better.
uf, y pensar que hace un año, cuando empezamos a salir, creí que al fin empezaba a conocerlo.

tuv.prop: so... are you gonna tell her or nah?
tuv.seg: i thought she didn’t work on sundays?
¿no dijo que no trabajaba los domingos?
of course! maybe your family might drop by during a road trip.
¡claro! quizá tu familia pase por ahí en alguna excursión.

tuv.prop: rhea, you’re not supposed to be here. did my dad let you in?
tuv.seg: huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: deep down, i know it’s just easier to let them go than to watch them leave when they know the truth.
it’s never my intention to rope you into this, so...
tuv.seg: we’re not heroes, rhea, and we’re not people you want to be involved with.
no somos héroes, rhea. tampoco gente con la que quieras involucrarte.

tuv.prop: it’s just the three of us though...
tuv.seg: yeah, but if jae and pascoal finish their game early, they’ll join us too!
sí, pero jae y pascoal vendrán si terminan su juego temprano.

tuv.prop: it’s fine. i really wanted to see you.
tuv.seg: i’ll just wait for you outside...
te esperaré afuera…
hey, wait! come back!
¡oye, espera! ¡regresa!

tuv.prop: hah, you... you’re the one who was at the shop that day.
you got in the way of our business that night.
tuv.seg: yeah, yeah, that’s you.
sí, sí, no hay duda.

tuv.prop: there’s another man here, he’s hurt, you have to help him!
tuv.seg: come back!
¡vuelve aquí!

tuv.prop: hey, slow down girl. where are you off to in such a hurry?
tuv.seg: huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: please stay back and call an ambulance.
tuv.seg: i’ll take it from here.
yo me ocuparé de esto.

tuv.prop: a word? we have something to discuss before we all go on with our day.
sorry that we have to borrow him for awhile.
tuv.seg: right. okay.
sí, claro.

tuv.prop: hey, what happened to your hand?
i noticed... you get cuts around your hands a lot. what happened?
tuv.seg: huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: oh yeah! man it almost slipped my mind.
how can you forget? it was your idea.
tuv.seg: phew. thanks for the reminder! let me grab my jacket real quick.
uf, ¡gracias por recordármelo! buscaré la chaqueta.
okay, maybe fifth time’s the charm. i can do this!
bien, tal vez la quinta sea la vencida. ¡puedo lograrlo!
...s-stripper?
¿{i>s<i}-{i>stripper<i}?

tuv.prop: people like us are not meant to share a life with others.
tuv.seg: and you of all people would know that, right?
y tú lo sabes mejor que nadie, ¿no?
c’mon, can’t you tell? man, think of all the chances you missed!
vamos, ¿no lo notas? ¡piensa en todas las oportunidades que perdiste!

tuv.prop: those two have been in there for awhile.
well, can’t help it. i guess my boy is really a man now.
tuv.seg: hm.
mm.

tuv.prop: they... break the law, and that makes them criminals, right?
the law is manmade anyway. they are just a set of rules decided by some old guys to keep things in order.
tuv.seg: yeah, but you know...
sí, pero ya sabes…

tuv.prop: um, i-i think i’m fine, but the girl-
tuv.seg: huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: tch. don’t pretend like you don’t know who i am.
tuv.seg: oh! you’re the girl from-
¡ah! eres la chica de…

tuv.prop: sometimes, we do it to protect the people who need it most.
it involves making decisions many can’t understand, taking risks we wouldn’t advise others to take…
tuv.seg: other times…
otras veces…

tuv.prop: anyway, i have another shift in a few hours. i should really be going now.
tuv.seg: um, so, thanks for last night!
bueno, ¡gracias por lo de anoche!

tuv.prop: so... are you gonna tell her or nah?
a moment of silence to support our fellow brother, who, in spite of his romantic challenges, did his best til the very end.
tuv.seg: aight, gather round boys.
señores, reunión del clan.

tuv.prop: geez, you do this all the time! don’t play dumb with me-
aw, you still kept this photo? this was ages ago! i thought it’d go missing by now.
tuv.seg: hm?
¿mm?

tuv.prop: i was giving you some genuine advice, how dare you accuse me of such selfish desires, i’m hurt!
ooh, wait, i think i know what this is about...
tuv.seg: not buying it.
buena actuación.

tuv.prop: so let’s start all over again, from the beginning, sound good?
tuv.seg: hm.
mm.

tuv.prop: ugh, yeah, tell me about it.
did you like what you see?
tuv.seg: so, shiro finally showed you his bedroom, huh?
así que por fin shiro te mostró su cuarto, ¿eh?
hey, whatever it is, you probably got the wrong guy.
oye, quizá te has equivocado de persona.
they won’t be bothering you anymore.
ya no van a molestarte.

tuv.prop: just come with me, i’ll show you a good time-
c’mon, you’re making this way harder than it needs to be.
tuv.seg: i don’t even know you, leave me alone!
ni siquiera te conozco, ¡déjame en paz!

tuv.prop: it’s really nice to see you again.
tuv.seg: same, same! we’ve got a lot to catch up on. what are you two up to tonight?
¡igualmente! tenemos que ponernos al día. ¿qué harán esta noche?

tuv.prop: ah... it’s been over twenty minutes. what could they be talking about for so long?
ah, crap. i shouldn’t be eavesdropping!
tuv.seg: hmm... it doesn’t look too good though...
mmm… aunque la cosa no se ve muy bien…

tuv.prop: i...no, you can stay. please stay.
i wasn’t ready for you to see me like this.
tuv.seg: i didn’t mean to be short, i just...
no quería ser cortante, solo…

tuv.prop: i tried to call you last night, where were you?
kori, you knew i was busy, i told you i was at work. it’s not something i can skip when i want to.
tuv.seg: even if you were busy, couldn’t you a least send me a text back?
aunque estuvieras ocupado, ¿no podrías haberme enviado un mensaje?

tuv.prop: nothing at all, really! we haven’t spoken to each other as much as we used to, and i guess i’m just trying to reconnect?
why don’t you come in and say hi?
tuv.seg: so you two go way back, then?
son viejos amigos, ¿no?

tuv.prop: guess i’ll just leave this here then...
tuv.seg: ah...
ah…

tuv.prop: well, i’d like to pretend i can read, but i really only know this from memory.
tuv.seg: and look, it fits like a glove!
y mira, ¡me queda como un guante!

tuv.prop: oh! i work here, but i guess i never told you that.
i um... saw you outside with someone. she seemed important so i didn’t want to interrupt...
tuv.seg: i just finished my shift and thought i’d say hi before you take off.
acabo de terminar mi turno y pensé saludarte antes de que te fueras.
wake up...
despierta…

tuv.prop: would you be upset if i said no?
tuv.seg: okay, do you want to talk about it?
¿quieres que lo hablemos?

tuv.prop: sorry about that, i wasn’t looking...
tuv.seg: huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: oh, okay. so... is it safe?
since you work the night shift all the time, i can’t imagine it’s all that fun.
tuv.seg: y’know, it’s like what you said before, it’s dangerous in the city these days, especially at night.
bueno, ya vimos que la ciudad se ha vuelto peligrosa últimamente, sobre todo por la noche.
yep, checks out.
sip, confirmado.

tuv.prop: i can’t make you stay if you want to go, so...
tuv.seg: ...when you walk out that door, you don’t have to talk to me again, and i won’t hold it against you. i promise.
… cuando salgas por esa puerta, ya no tendrás que volver a hablarme. te prometo que no te lo reprocharé.

tuv.prop: listen, i get why you’re worried, but I’ll be fine! it’s not your job to take care of me.
tuv.seg: rhea-
rhea...

tuv.prop: you’re ALWAYS busy, but he was here the minute i called him. he’d drop everything to be here with me, but you?
and this isn’t your first time. you knew how important it is to me to have you around.
tuv.seg: what kind of boyfriend disappears and just shows up only when it’s convenient?!
¡¿qué clase de novio desaparece y solo vuelve a aparecer cuando le viene bien?!
huh?
¿eh?

tuv.prop: not to scare you, but i don’t think that one training camp ten years ago is enough to cut it...
tuv.seg: fine, say we got all that covered, you’re still... okay with being around someone like me?.
bien, olvidemos eso. aun así… ¿estás cómoda relacionándote con alguien como yo?

tuv.prop: listen, i’m sorry i came uninvited. now that i know you’re fine, i’ll leave.
tuv.seg: n-no, wait!
¡n-no, espera!

tuv.prop: why don’t you come in and say hi?
tuv.seg: m-may i?
¿p-puedo?
en_US
es_LATAM

tuv.prop: um, yeah. there really isn’t anything else, is there?
y’know, you never really told me what your job is. what does your family do, exactly?
tuv.seg: oh. right.
así es.

tuv.prop: no way, how long has it been? i can barely recognise you! you look so...
tuv.seg: um... yeah? i think so.
mmm, sí. eso creo.

tuv.prop: yo, Rhea, for real? how’ve you been?
bruh, and you were not kidding when you said she is cute now!
tuv.seg: yeah, it’s been awhile, you look the same!
sí, cuánto tiempo, ¡tú estás igual!

tuv.prop: oh. yeah. i just had to run some errands.
tuv.seg: it’s nothing big, though it was really last minute.
nada importante, algo que surgió en el último momento.

tuv.prop: no matter how careful you think you are...
tuv.seg: ...there will always be consequences.
… {bi>siempre<bi} habrá consecuencias.

tuv.prop: noooo not at all! i’m just saying it’s a possibility, it’s a compliment!
NO, that came out very wrong! that’s not- NOOOoooooOOo!
tuv.seg: i think you could pull it off! i’d hire you-
creo que lo harías bien. yo te contrataría…
um...
mmm…

tuv.prop: can’t tell if she’s serious, though.
tuv.seg: so you’re his babysitter now? somehow, that suits you.
conque eres su niñera, ¿eh? encaja contigo.

tuv.prop: it’s fine, max. you haven’t seen your partner in ages, i can imagine why you’d be in a hurry to leave.
tuv.seg: rhea. are you sure you don’t mind if i take off first?
rhea, ¿seguro que no te molesta que me vaya primero?

tuv.prop: hey... that’s the kid everyone is talking about, right?
are you sure? he doesn’t really look the part though...
tuv.seg: i heard his family is a group of mobsters...
dicen que sus familiares son mafiosos…

tuv.prop: no way, how long has it been? i can barely recognise you! you look so...
i could say the same to you.
tuv.seg: different?
¿diferente?

tuv.prop: i mean, i just like my room a lot-
tuv.seg: wait, n-no, that’s not what i meant.
aguarda, n-no, {b>no<b} quise decir eso.

tuv.prop: it happens, he tends to disappeaar and show up a day or two later.
you mean the same place he used to live before?
tuv.seg: usually when he doesn’t come back, he’s just chilling at his fam’s, y’know, the Iekami residence?
cuando no viene, suele ser porque está con su familia. ¿recuerdas la residencia iekami?
come with us quietly, we’ll treat you real nice-
ven calladita. te trataremos bien…

tuv.prop: the physics... it makes no sense...
tuv.seg: rhea... i think you’re thinking too hard about this...
rhea… creo que no es para tanto…

tuv.prop: you had the choice to come quietly with us, but you chose to make a fuss and now we’re in this mess...
tuv.seg: pfft... wow, you really are a tough cookie, aren’t ya?
uf… eres un hueso duro de roer, ¿eh?

tuv.prop: oi, oi, HE did that? god, that makes my blood boil.
he’s got the balls, acting all high and mighty.
tuv.seg: i heard he got paid big for that job.
oí que le pagaron mucho por el trabajo.

tuv.prop: same, same! we’ve got a lot to catch up on. what are you two up to tonight?
actually, i’ve got something to do later.
tuv.seg: oh, nothing much!
¡ah, nada!

tuv.prop: hey, slow down girl. where are you off to in such a hurry?
tuv.seg: i think i have a better idea...
tengo una idea mejor…

tuv.prop: heh, you’re lucky you’ve still got the age advantage.
ah. suddenly i don’t want this anymore...
tuv.seg: give yourself a few more years and all that sugar just gets you a doctor’s appointment!
¡unos años más, y toda esa azúcar te llevará al consultorio del médico!

tuv.prop: anyway, that’s my cue to leave.
tuv.seg: hang on, you didn’t touch your coffee. do you want it to-go?
aguarda, no tomaste el café. ¿lo quieres para llevar?

tuv.prop: the writing on this jacket... it’s your family name, isn’t it?
tuv.seg: n-no problem....
d-de nada…

tuv.prop: so this old friend of yours... are you two close?
we lost touch when i moved away, so we’re not as close as we could be i guess?
tuv.seg: uh... we used to go to school together when we were kids.
eh… íbamos juntos a la escuela cuando éramos niños.

tuv.prop: nothing at all, really! we haven’t spoken to each other as much as we used to, and i guess i’m just trying to reconnect?
tuv.seg: so what has shiro told you?
entonces, ¿qué te dijo shiro?

tuv.prop: when i placed my arm around him....
tuv.seg: ...i thought i felt something on his shoulder...
… me pareció sentir algo en su hombro…

tuv.prop: so say your prayers, cuz you’re going to hell.
please, i want to go home-
tuv.seg: hey! it’s okay, you’re okay.
no pasa nada, estás bien.

tuv.prop: i don’t know how much you know about the outskirts, but my mom said there’s a lot to do there too. it’ll be different!
tuv.seg: oh, or you could come visit me instead?
o podrías venir a visitarme, ¿no?

tuv.prop: oh yeah, kids at school used to talk about that a lot.
yeah, i thought so too. so all the crimes you’ve been hearing about? apparently, they are being taken care of by these so called “fictional heroes.”
tuv.seg: i thought it was just some silly rumour.
pensé que era algo sin sentido.

tuv.prop: bas, are you feeding a whole village with that?
tuv.seg: i got the goods. are y’all ready to partaaaay?
ya tengo todo. ¿listos para la superfiesta?

tuv.prop: you look like you could use some vitamin c
tuv.seg: why are you green?!
¡¿por qué eres verde?!

tuv.prop: well, there were plenty of men who were injured last night, but none fit the description you gave us.
tuv.seg: there was a man who was hurt and he fled the scene. did you guys find him?
el hombre al que hirieron y huyó del lugar. ¿pudieron encontrarlo?

tuv.prop: well, you were behaving like a dick the whole night...
try again tomorrow, seriously? who does he think he is?
tuv.seg: it’s okay... just shake it off.
no pasa nada, solo olvídalo.

tuv.prop: pfft... wow, you really are a tough cookie, aren’t ya?
tuv.seg: nO, don’t come any closer!
¡no! ¡no te acerques!

tuv.prop: i didn’t mean to be short, i just...
why don’t you come in and say hi?
tuv.seg: so you two go way back, then?
son viejos amigos, ¿no?
it’s fine. i want to.
no lo es. quiero hacerlo.
what, you know him?
¿lo conoces?

tuv.prop: ah, well, i did grow up here, but i moved away and now i’m back, so you’re not wrong.
so you don’t know anyone here, then?
tuv.seg: oh, really?
ah, ¿sí?
they... break the law, and that makes them criminals, right?
porque… incumplen la ley. eso los convierte en delincuentes, ¿no?

tuv.prop: you should’ve at least discussed with me before letting a stranger into our home.
tuv.seg: hm?
¿mm?
but it sure as hell feels like it!
¡pero créeme que se oyó así!
shiro, make him stop!
shiro, ¡dile que pare!

tuv.prop: he hasn’t changed too much though, just looks a little different. i’m surprised we can even recognise each other.
um... sorry, is there a reason why you’re asking? have we met by any chance?
tuv.seg: right. how sweet.
ah, qué ternura.

tuv.prop: oh, or you could come visit me instead?
tuv.seg: i don’t know how much you know about the outskirts, but my mom said there’s a lot to do there too. it’ll be different!
no sé mucho sobre vivir en las afueras, pero mi mamá dice que también hay mucho que hacer allí. ¡será diferente!

tuv.prop: man, what a way to start a sunday, am i right? so much for sleeping in...
so, shiro finally showed you his bedroom, huh?
tuv.seg: ugh, yeah, tell me about it.
ay, sí. ni lo digas.

tuv.prop: there’s just way too much proof of their existence, yet somehow, no face reveal! would you believe that?
i’m serious! no one aside from the witnesses would know how they look like, but even so, it’s pretty vague.
tuv.seg: c’mon, there’s no way.
vamos, no puede ser.

tuv.prop: anyway, that’s my cue to leave.
tuv.seg: ...shiro?
¿shiro?…
he’s cute...
qué lindo…

tuv.prop: OBASI? you guys are still in contact? no way, it’s been ages!
tuv.seg: bas? you mean...
{bi>¿bas?<bi} hablas de…

tuv.prop: even if you don’t want to talk to me...
...looked like you had so much to say.
tuv.seg: that look in your eyes...
tu mirada…

tuv.prop: you just had to give my boys a hard time, didn’t you?
i heard he got paid big for that job.
tuv.seg: oi, oi, HE did that? god, that makes my blood boil.
un momento, ¿fue {i>él<i}? cielos, eso me enfurece.

tuv.prop: i don’t even know you, leave me alone!
tuv.seg: just come with me, i’ll show you a good time-
eh, ven conmigo, la pasarás bien…

tuv.prop: oh yeah! man it almost slipped my mind.
tuv.seg: we made plans with rhea, right? something about a home movie.
hicimos planes con rhea, ¿no? para ver una película en casa.
w-wait, you can’t be serious?!
¿q-qué? ¡¿hablas en serio?!

tuv.prop: the physics... it makes no sense...
tuv.seg: look at it, it defies gravity!
míralo, ¡desafía la gravedad!

tuv.prop: now that you know the truth, do you really like who i am...
tuv.seg: i know i didn’t turn out to be who you thought i would be, so please be honest, rhea.
me doy cuenta de que no soy la persona que recordabas, así que sé sincera, rhea.

tuv.prop: i for one think she’s in love with you.
tuv.seg: don’t worry son, the men in this family have a history of being successful romantics. plus, you’ve inherited my good looks which is a massive advantage.
no te preocupes, los hombres de esta familia tenemos antecedentes de ser exitosos en el amor. además, heredaste mis rasgos físicos. es una enorme ventaja.

tuv.prop: i can’t hold it in any longer.
tuv.seg: hey, don’t touch her!
¡eh, no la toques!

tuv.prop: there’s the little girl that came with you. she’s doing fine, and we also managed to reunite her with her father.

ah, me alegra saberlo.
there’s another man here, he’s hurt, you have to help him!
hay otro hombre. está herido, ¡tienen que ayudarlo!

tuv.prop: the shiro i knew before wouldn’t have told me any of the things you just did.
you’re not who you used to be, you’re better, and i think i’d like to get to know you all over again.
tuv.seg: he wouldn’t have had the guts to tell me how he feels, or look me in the eye when he does it.
no habría tenido la valentía de explicarme cómo se siente o de mirarme a los ojos cuando habla.

tuv.prop: hah, no! i’m just a friend! we used to go to school together, that’s all!

tuv.prop: oh, sorry, i don’t think i introduced myself...?

tuv.prop: the cops call them criminals, and some people think they’re inspiring more violence than saving lives...
tuv.seg: i’m serious! no one aside from the witnesses would know how they look like, but even so, it’s pretty vague.

tuv.prop: you don’t understand, i think he was stabbed. he has to be in the hospital somehow.

tuv.prop: normally the house would be a lot busier, but you’re early. the rest of us are asleep.

tuv.seg: oh, is this shared housing?
¡ah! ¿es una vivienda compartida?

tuv.prop: don’t you know it’s rude to keep someone waiting for this long?

tuv.prop: aw, don’t say that! you still have bas with you, remember?

tuv.seg: stop following me!

tuv.prop: thankfully, it appears that the injury you sustained on your head is not too serious, though it is strongly recommended that you take a few days off to rest.
did you guys find anyone else at the scene?
tuv.seg: yes, i’m aware of that.
sí, lo entiendo.

tuv.prop: heh, you’re lucky you’ve still got the age advantage.

tuv.prop: shiro, i’m sure you know what we need to talk about.

tuv.prop: so what has shiro told you?

tuv.seg: nothing at all, really! we haven’t spoken to each other as much as we used to, and i guess i’m just trying to reconnect?

tuv.prop: OH. ah, my grandfather owns a business.
so you provide a service... at night?
tuv.seg: you could say we provide a service, and everyone in the family are a part of it. i just mostly work the night shift.
se podría decir que ofrecemos un servicio, y todos en la familia participamos. yo trabajo principalmente en el turno noche.

tuv.prop: you promised me it was over.
tuv.seg: that was the same one from before, wasn’t it?
es el mismo de antes, ¿no?

tuv.prop: yeah, but after the night i put you through, you must have some questions.
i guess we can pretend this never happened for now, and we’ll go back to normal, it’s fine.
tuv.seg: i do, but we don’t have to go into that now if you don’t want to.
sí, pero no quiero hacértelas ahora si tú no quieres responderlas.

tuv.prop: i can’t find my daddy, and these big scary people are following me-

oye, ¿estás bien? ¿dónde están tus padres?

tuv.prop: please... i want to go home...

tuv.prop: yeah, don’t sweat it! i think you’re alright.
tuv.seg: i trust you.
confío en ti.

editor

tuv.prop: here! i know it’s not exactly your style, but i think it suits you, and it’s something to remember me by!

hmm...

tuv.prop: i didn’t mean to intrude like that.

tengo a la niña. está herida pero no es grave. ella mencionó a un hombre que escapó…

tuv.prop: what kind of boyfriend disappears and just shows up only when it’s convenient?!
why else are we together if you’re gonna be missing all the time?

tuv.prop: hmm... it doesn’t look too good though...

tuv.prop: you can’t actually believe you’re just a toy to me.
the only reason why i’d even be with someone else last night was because you failed to show up.
tuv.seg: yes, and i’m beginning to think you found a new one behind my back!

tuv.prop: are you sure you saw him leave?

tuv.prop: i didn’t mean to be short, i just...
tuv.seg: i...no, you can stay. please stay.
yo… puedes quedarte. no te vayas.

tuv.prop: i mean, it’s sure as hell more interesting than stories about snooty customers...

tuv.prop: right. sorry, you could’ve woken me, i wouldn’t have minded.
besides, you’re still better than a certain someone who flaked on us.

tuv.prop: i never thought i’d see you again...

tuv.prop: we’re not heroes, rhea, and we’re not people you want to be involved with.
